summary:
â€”â€”Apocalypse Survival Guideâ€”â€”
* First! "Gems" kill mode
-New match-3 gameplay, reappearing the classic zombie
-The duel between humans and zombies, the competition between resourcefulness and strategy,
-A wonderful combination of match 3 leisure and SLG strategy storm
-Under the hustle and bustle of the doomsday, you will sound the clarion call to restart human civilization

* set up! The last city of refuge
-Sanctuary City, the only remaining stronghold of human civilization.
Become a guardian, rebuild the habitat of survivors, and guard the last seeds of human civilization
-Rise up to fight back and destroy the corpse of zombies; siege the city and broaden the territory of civilization; upgrade weapons and obtain war resources

* Recruit! The strongest partner in history
-On the way to save the survivors, you will continue to meet talented heroes
-Please collect them under your command and embark on an unknown journey of civilized rejuvenation together

* Be careful! Your kind
-At the end of the world, civilization is shattered, and the barbaric behavior hidden in the original DNA is gradually exposed. The same kind is more terrifying than zombies
-Shopping is more expensive than people, and resources are more valuable than human lives in the end. It will be your destiny choice if the weak is strong or the cooperation is win-win.

Join the League of Survivors and explore the unknown together!

title: Tiles Survive!
summary:
Enter the world of "Tiles Survive!" and guide your team of survivors through a harsh wilderness. As the core of your survivor team, explore the wild, gather key resources, and use them wisely to strengthen your shelter.
Venture into different tiles and expand your territory. Improve how you manage resources, build and upgrade structures, and connect electricity to speed up production. Create a self-sufficient shelter where every decision shapes your survivorsâ€™ future.

Game Features:

â— Operations & Management
Enhance your production structures for smoother workflows. Use electricity to run your shelter more efficiently. Unlock and upgrade more structures to meet your growing needs.

â— Assign Survivors
Assign jobs to your survivors, like hunters, chefs, or lumberjacks. Pay attention to their health and morale to keep productivity high.

â— Resource Collection
Explore further and discover unique resources in different biomes. Gather and use every resource to your advantage.

â— Multi-map & Collectibles
Travel through multiple maps to find loot and special items. Bring them back to decorate and improve your shelter.

â— Recruit Heroes
Find heroes with special skills and traits who boost your shelterâ€™s capabilities.

â— Form Alliances
Team up with friends to stand against common threats, such as severe weather and wild creatures.

In "Tiles Survive!", every choice matters. How you manage resources, plan your shelter, and explore the unknown will decide your fate. Are you ready to face the challenge and thrive in the wild? Download now and begin your epic adventure!

title: Brawl Stars
summary:
Fast-paced 3v3 & 5v5 MOBA and battle royale made for mobile! Play a variety of online PvP arena multiplayer shooting & melee game modes in under three minutes â€“ with friends or solo.

Unlock and upgrade dozens of Brawlers with powerful super abilities, star powers and gadgets! Collect unique skins to stand out and show off.

Battle in multiple game modes




Gem Grab (3v3,5v5): Team up for realtime 3v3 and 5v5 MOBA arena PvP battle royales against online players from across the world. Team up to battle and out strategize against the opposing team. Collect and hold 10 gems to win, but get fragged and lose your gems.


Showdown: A MOBA battle royale-style fight for survival. Collect powerups for your Brawler. Grab a friend or play solo, be the last Brawler standing in the rowdiest MOBA PvP battle royale yet. Winner takes all!


Brawl Ball (3v3,5v5): It's a whole new brawl game! Show off your soccer/football skills and score before the other team. Maybe itâ€™s not the kind of â€œshootingâ€ you meant when you were looking for a multiplayer shooting game... but there are no red cards here â€“ just PvP team fun.


Bounty (3v3,5v5): Battle royale bounty-hunting! Take out opponents and earn stars, but donâ€™t let them pick you off first. The squad with the most stars wins!


Heist (3v3,5v5): Protect your teamâ€™s safe, and try to crack open your opponentsâ€™. Sneak, blast, battle and blow your way clear to enemy treasure in this PvP multiplayer shooting game.


Special Events: Limited-time PvE and PvP multiplayer shooting games, 3v3/5v5 matches and battle royale events.


Championship Challenge: Join Brawl Stars' esports scene with in-game qualifiers.

Unlock and upgrade Brawlers


Collect and upgrade Brawlers with powerful Super abilities, star powers and gadgets! Level up and collect unique skins. Send them into PvP & battle royale games to collect trophies!

Brawl pass


Win 3v3 and 5v5 PvP matches and battle royale games to earn trophies. Get Gems, Power Points, Pins, and Starr Drops! Fresh content every season.

Become a star player


Battle in 3v3 & 5v5 PvP matches and battle royale-style games to climb the PvP leaderboards & prove youâ€™re the greatest MOBA Brawler of them all! Join or start your own MOBA club with fellow players online to share tips and battle together. Climb to the top of the PvP leaderboards in global and local multiplayer shooting game rankings.


Constantly evolving MOBS


Look out for new Brawlers, skins, maps, special events and game modes in the future. Customize Brawlers with unlockable skins. Enjoy 3v3 and 5v5 PvP battles solo or with friends online.
New PvP events and multiplayer shooting games daily. Player-designed maps offer challenging new terrain to master.

Please note! Brawl Stars is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Game also includes random rewards.

From the makers of Clash of Clans, Clash Royale, and Boom Beach!

Brawl Stars may request permission via in game pop ups to access your camera and send you notifications.

Notifications: For sending notifications related to the game
Consent is optional and you can use the app and play the game regardless of whether or not you consent. You may refuse to give consent within the game. However, certain app features may not work properly if you refuse optional access permissions.

title: MapleStory M - Fantasy MMORPG
summary:
Warm winter fun fills the December update!
Join the Dark Maplemas winter festival and the brand-new The Sixth Star event, now live in MapleStory M!

â–¶ 1. Winter Festival: Dark Maplemas Event
A special holiday celebration begins!
Hunt monsters, play mini-games, and collect coins to claim generous rewards. Enjoy buffs, the Coin Shop, and Coin Pass and experience all the joy of MapleStory Mâ€™s winter season!

â–¶ 2. New Journey: The Sixth Star, Growth Star
The fifth journey toward the 6th Job, The Growth Star, begins!
Complete growth missions for Lv.200+ characters and claim valuable rewards. Gather star power and prepare for the next stage of your adventure!

A season of warmth and progress awaits!
Experience the Dark Maplmas festival and Growth Star event now in MapleStory M!
________________________________________
â–¶ Explore the essence of the best anime MMORPG game â—€
Adventurer! Your journey across the Maple World begins now in MapleStory M, the iconic gacha fantasy mobile game.
From Henesys and Kerning City to the sky-high Ludibriumâ€”battle through beautiful 2D worlds that combine the nostalgia of classic MMORPGs with the thrill of modern gacha systems.
Challenge endless content like Star Force Fields, Mu Lung Dojo, Monster Park, Story Exploration, and Kerning M Tower to grow your hero to greatness in this fun MMORPG game.
________________________________________
â–¶ Customize your own unique character â—€
Whether youâ€™re a MapleStory veteran or a new MMORPG mobile gamer, this anime RPG lets you stand out. From stylish outfits and fantasy hair dyes to adorable pets and androidsâ€”create your story your way.
________________________________________
â–¶ Stronger together: Multiplayer MMORPG action â—€
Form guilds, go on co-op boss raids, and climb leaderboards in true MMORPG fashion. Whether you're here for anime, fantasy, or social adventure, MapleStory M has it all.
________________________________________
ğŸŒŸ Auto-battle through gacha-rich dungeonsâ€”build your strength anytime, anywhere in this anime fantasy world!
ğŸŒŸ Enjoy anime, mobile RPG combat, and deep character growth all in one gacha-friendly MMORPG!
ğŸŒŸ With constant updates and fantasy events, the adventure never ends in MapleStory M!
ğŸŒŸ Download now and rediscover why this anime MMORPG is the best mobile fantasy experience today!

Are you having problems? Contact our 1:1 Support in-game or send us an inquiry at

title: Call of DutyÂ®: Mobile - Garena
summary:
â— Special Season Celebrating Call of Duty: Mobile's 6th Anniversary
â— New DMZ: Recon Mode. An Extraction-themed battlefield where you must hunt, loot, and survive!
â— Opening the arena with exciting activities from a special collaboration between Call of Duty: Mobile and Street Fighter 6
â— New Weapon (Marksman Rifle): The SO-14, capable of crushing opponents, with a multitude of accessories

Call of DutyÂ®: Mobile | Season 11: 6th Anniversary

[Call of Duty: Mobile Season 11: 6th Anniversary]
Filled with special features, including the launch of the popular DMZ: Recon mode, featuring an Extraction-themed battlefield. The game features legendary fighters from Call of Duty: Mobile and Street Fighter 6, as well as a variety of other exciting 6th anniversary events.

[New Large-Scale Mode: DMZ: Recon]
The latest large-scale PVE/PVP mode, DMZ: Recon, is here!
Enjoy the new maps ""Snake Island"" and ""Building 21"", gather supplies, intelligence, and complete your quest amidst dense fog and unsolved mysteries, a high-risk area waiting for brave adventurers to explore!

[Street Fighter 6 Special Collaboration Arena Opens]
Legendary fighters take to the battlefield with the arrival of Call of Duty: Mobile x Street Fighter 6. Ring the bell to ring the 6th Anniversary Season. with limited gameplay, series weaponry, and limited edition Street Fighter 6 prizes you can't miss!

[Secret Cache x Street Fighter 6 Update]
A new Legendary weapon, Striker - Source Code, will be added to the Secret Cache and replaces the RUS-79U - Mystical Lamp. After the Season update, brave warriors will have a chance to obtain Striker - Source Code fragments when opening Secret Cache boxes (S11), as well as special Street Fighter 6 collaboration rewards!

[New Weapon: (Marksman Rifle): SO-14]
The ability to switch between semi-automatic and fully automatic fire allows for adaptation to various combat situations, with exceptional firepower and stability.

title: Pikmin Bloom
summary:
Pikmin Bloom offers a fun way to earn rewards for going outside and exploring with friends! With the brand-new Weekly Challenges feature, you can team up with others, no matter how far away they might be, and work towards a shared steps goal!
__
COLLECT over 150 types of unique Decor Pikmin! Some wear fishing lures, some don hamburger buns, and others flaunt paper airplanes, just to name a few.

EXPLORE your neighborhood to add more Pikmin to your squad! The more you walk, the more seedlings and fruit youâ€™ll find.

TEAM UP with friends to take down mushrooms and earn rewards! Select a dream team of Pikmin to increase your score and nab rarer fruit types!

DECORATE the world with beautiful flowers everywhere you go! Watch the map fill up with colorful blossoms, planted by you and by other players nearby!

Head outside, explore your neighborhood, and make the world bloom!

_______________

Notes:
- This app is free-to-play and offers in-game purchases. It is optimized for smartphones, not tablets.
- It is recommended to play while connected to a network (Wi-Fi, 3G, 4G, 5G, or LTE) in order to obtain accurate location information.
- Supported Devices: Devices with at least 2 GB of RAM running on Android 9.0 or above
- Compatibility is not guaranteed for devices without GPS capabilities or devices that are connected only to Wi-Fi networks.
- Google Fit needs to be installed and permissions enabled in order for Pikmin Bloom to accurately track your steps.
- Compatibility information may be changed at any time.
- Information current as of August, 2022.
- Compatibility is not guaranteed for all devices.
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically reduce battery life.

- Some functions require support for the following services:
ARCore - For optimal performance, it is recommended that you use a device with at least 2 GB of RAM. If you are experiencing frequent problems such as device crashes or delays while using Pikmin Bloom, please try the following troubleshooting steps.
Close all apps except Pikmin Bloom while you are playing.
Use the most recent operating system available for your device.
If the problem persists, please contact us with details.
Note: Many devices that do not have a built-in data-network connection do not include a GPS sensor. In the event of mobile-data network congestion, such devices may not be able to maintain a sufficient GPS signal to play.

title: GarenaÂ® Delta Force
summary:
The biggest update of the yearâ€”Delta Force New Season AHSARAH is Live!

Operators, get ready for the Ultimate AAA Mobile Warfare!

[First Mobile Warfare: All-Out 24v24 Combat]â€¨
Experience never-seen-before modern wars on mobile in this epic All-Out Warfare. 48 players clash across land, sea, and air. Pilot a Black Hawk for air dominance, command a tank to break defenses, and unleash chaos with C4 or missile strikes. Everything is destructibleâ€”leave nothing standing!
10 Warfare Maps, 6 Unique Modes, 100+ Weapons: Gear up and dominate! Or just blow it ALL up!

[Next-gen Extraction Shooter: No Pay to Win, You Play to Win]â€¨
In Operations mode, remember this one rule: Loot, Fight, and Extract When the Time is Right! Equip your best gear, team up in squads of 3, and take on AI Mercenaries, powerful Bosses, and the most feared player squads. No risk, no reward!
NO PAY-TO-WIN. Start your fair fight stress-free now with a FREE 3x3 Safe Box!

[Become An Elite Operator & Build Your Dream Squad]â€¨
Choose from 10+ Elite Operators worldwide, team up with friends, and take on high-stakes missions. Brave relentless gunfire, master tactical gear and weapons, and show the world YOU are the best of the best!

[Make Weapons & Vehicles: Truly YOU By Customization]â€¨
Featuring 100+ weapons, a cutting-edge tuning system, and thousands of customization options, every decision shapes both performance and style. Craft your perfect arsenal!
Command land, sea, and air vehicles, fine-tuning every detail to dominate the warfare your way.

[Epic Battle: Optimized to Dominate. Play Anywhere, Progress Everywhere]â€¨
Immerse yourself in 120fps graphics, crystal-clear HD visuals and ultra-long-distance rendering. With ongoing optimization, even lower settings deliver impressive realism.
Sync your data across all platforms. Play anywhere, anytime!

[Global Anti-Cheat Protection: G.T.I. Security, Always Fair Play]â€¨
Our mission is to foster a healthy, fair gaming environment. Building on the legacy of Delta Force, weâ€™ve assembled a dedicated task force to uphold the rules of engagement. Equipped with cutting-edge tools, the G.T.I. Security team swiftly detects and eliminates cheaters and malicious behavior, ensuring a level playing field for all.

title: Monster Hunter Now
summary:
The thrill of the hunt is calling. Begin your hunting adventure now!

ğŸŒ Hunt monsters in the real world:
Embark on a global quest to track down and hunt some of the most formidable monsters from the Monster Hunter universe as they appear in our world. Forge powerful weapons and team up with fellow hunters to track down larger-than-life monsters and take them head-on.

âš”ï¸ Authentic hunting action carefully adapted to mobile:
Discover a variety of monsters depending on the habitat around you â€“ Forest, Desert or Swamp â€“ and engage in thrilling hunts solo, or band together with fellow hunters to take on these large monsters. The simplified tap-based controls and high-fidelity graphics enable you to engage in enjoyable hunting action wherever you go.

ğŸ“· See monsters around you with the AR Camera:
Experience what itâ€™s like to have these iconic monsters appear in the real world with exclusive AR Camera features.

â±ï¸ Master the hunt in 75 seconds:
Can you complete the hunt within 75 seconds? Master the weapons, craft armor sets and hone your skills â€“ exploit weaknesses and utilize every element at your disposal to take on the hunt.

ğŸ”´ Mark monsters even with your phone in the pocket:
With Adventure Sync, you can use a Paintball to track monsters while you explore your town and bring the hunt to your doorstep afterwards. As you explore, your Palico can mark passing monsters with Palico Paintballs, even while you arenâ€™t actively playing, allowing you to return to them later, ensuring that the action never stops.

title: DreamÂ RaidersÂ 2:Â Wilds
summary:
Ready to begin a relaxing idle adventure in another world?
Waitâ€”what?! Youâ€™ve been reincarnated as an adorable pet?! Become a mysterious (and irresistibly fluffy) hero in a whimsical fantasy realm, and start your cozy adventure across Dreamland. Set up camp, soak up the sunlight, share drinks, and enjoy a sizzling barbecue with friendsâ€”what could be better?

ã€Effortless Idling, Endless Rewardsã€‘
Wake up from a sweet dreamâ€”huh? Why is the warehouse overflowing?! Stay tucked under the covers and still earn tons of resources! Level up easily and enjoy shared experience growth across your team. Who says you canâ€™t get stronger while lying down?

ã€A Laid-back Life in Another Worldã€‘
Gather resources, craft items, and build your very own home in another world. Sip a little wine, unwind after a long day, and enjoy the slow rhythm of fantasy life!

ã€Diverse Maps, Relaxed Adventuresã€‘
Do you love green meadows where the breeze gently brushes your face? Or would you rather wander along golden beaches, feeling the call of the waves? Maybe the unknown calls to youâ€”mysterious caves, molten cores, or floating islands high above the clouds? Leave real-world worries behind and explore the breathtaking landscapes of Dreamland!

ã€Stress-free Social Fun at the Campã€‘
As the campfire crackles and the scent of grilled meat fills the air, lay out your picnic blanket and gather your friends! Try out some exotic delicacies from another worldâ€”ever wondered what dragon tail might taste like?

ã€Hands-Free Combat Anytime, Anywhereã€‘
No complicated controlsâ€”just jump into battle with a single tap! Your team fights automatically with dazzling effects, letting you enjoy smooth and exciting combat wherever you are. Sit back, relax, and watch the show!

ã€Adorable Pets, Endless Varietyã€‘
Meet the Dreamiesâ€”your cute, fluffy, and loyal friends of all shapes and sizes! Perfect for traveling, exploring, and collecting resources, each Dreamie has unique abilities that boost your power and productivity. Who could resist building a whole nest of adorable companions?

title: FishingNewEra - Casino Slots
summary:
"Fishing New Era" meticulously crafted over two years by a professional team, presents an epic production with all-new true 3D fishing experience, ushering in a new age of fishing games! It carries forward the classics, remaining true to its original aspirations.

[True 3D Panoramic View, Immersive Graphics]
Panoramic Views, Epic Bosses, Stunning Special Effects, Experience Realistic Critical Hits! The official 3D fishing game is upgraded, crafted with dedication by a professional
team. It features an extraordinary collision of arcade fishing and mythological characters across dimensions!

[Mythology's New Chapter, Begins with a Bang]
Revolutionizing traditional fishing game mechanics, this game breaks through the dimensional barriers of fishing, perfectly integrating mythological elements with the introduction of all-new bosses. It unveils a brand new fishing ground and gameplay, marking the dawn of a new era in fishing games

[Spectacular Cannons, Glamorous Wings]
Enjoy the thrilling and stylish cannons and the magnificent, dazzling wings that allow you to showcase your unique style in the underwater fishing world, leaving audiences amazed. With an innovative power system, effortlessly take down targets, making it a dream come true to score hits worth hundreds of millions with a single shot!

[Packed with Bonuses, Non-stop Event Action]
Log in to receive a massive amount of coins! Enjoy three-day login gifts, collect various treasures to enjoy powerful coin replenishment privileges, and take advantage of recharge bonuses. Dive into the deep sea for treasure hunts, participate in fishing tournaments, and claim multiple benefits non-stop!

[Exclusive Information]
Please follow "Fishing New Era" on Facebook and other major social networks to get information in advance, ask questions, select opinions, and there will be a large number of
welfare activities launched from time to time~
1. Fishing New Era Facebook official fan page: https://www.facebook.com/FishingNewEra
2. Fishing New Era official feedback email: fishingnewera@gmail.com

[Special Note]
1. This game is only for adult players (18+).
2. This game does not provide "cash transactions" and there is no opportunity to win cash or physical prizes. It is only provided for users' entertainment purposes.3. You may
not use this game to engage in illegal or other similar activities.

title: Lineage2 Revolution
summary:
A revolution of mobile games, Lineage 2: Revolution

The immortal power reignites.
Experience the overwhelming might of the Death Knight, the destroyer.

â– â–  Game Features â– â– 
â–¶A Real World at your Fingertips: The Largest Persistent Open World on Mobile
Play in synchronous real-time with players from across the globe,
and experience the realm of Lineage2 Revolution from anywhere, anytime.

â–¶The Groundbreaking Lineage Series: Better than Ever
Lineage's high quality graphics and favorite landmarks are optimized for mobile and brought to life in breathtaking detail thanks to the Unreal 4 Engine.

â–¶Clans and Fierce Competition: An Unmatched Game Community
Take up arms with the best fighters in the world in massive PvP Clan battles,
using your special skills to master epic Castle Raids and reap benefits together!

Optimize your Lineage2 Revolution experience and enable:
- Audio recording/replay for voice chatting
- Read and type access to external storage for downloading resources
â€» This app can be played on tablet devices. â€»

[Permission Details]
â–¶ Optional Permissions
Storage
- Access is needed to record and send voice files
Microphone
- Allows players to voice chat
Camera
- Used for submitting queries to Customer Support
â€» Please note: not allowing permission will not restrict gameplay. â€»

â–¶ How to Retract Permission
- OS 6.0 or higher: Settings > Application Manager > Select App > Permissions
- OS 6.0 or lower: Unable to retract access manually; uninstall app

â–  Product Information & Usage Details â– 
- Recommended Specifications: CPU Quad core 2.3GHz, Ram 3GB
- Minimum Specifications: CPU Quad core 1.2GHz, Ram 2GB


â€» This app offers in-app purchases. You can disable this feature by adjusting your deviceâ€™s settings.

By downloading this game, you are agreeing to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play.
- Terms of Service: http://help.netmarble.com/policy/terms_of_service.asp?locale=en
- Privacy Policy: http://help.netmarble.com/policy/privacy_policy.asp?locale=en

title: Summoners War
summary:
Summoners War: Sky Arena
The legendary turn-based strategy RPG with immersive storytelling â€” loved by over 300 million Summoners worldwide!

Join the spectacular global war alongside over 1,000 Monsters and experience the ultimate strategic fantasy battle.

The more you fight and refine your perfect strategies, the more your Monsters will grow into cherished companions across the Sky Islands.

[Summoners War: Sky Arena]
Official Community: https://www.facebook.com/SummonersWarCom2us/

â–¶ Game Features

â—† Stunning Action and Infinite Strategy
Experience dynamic battles in a truly different fantasy world!
Utilize 23 types of Rune Sets, each with unique effects,
and build your own strategy to claim victory.
Simple controls, endless tactical possibilities!

â—† The True Essence of a Collectible RPG: Massive Monster Collection
Fire, Water, Wind, Light, and Dark!
Five attributes and over 1,000 Monsters, each with distinctive skills and styles.
Maximize each Monsterâ€™s individuality and craft the ultimate strategy for thrilling victories!

â—† A World of Endless Adventure and Battle
Village, battle, adventure, collection, growth, and crafting!
Uncover the schemes of dark forces and take down powerful bosses like Dragons and Giants.
Join real-time 3-player raids, awaken new power in the Dimension Hole,
explore Tartarusâ€™ Labyrinth, hunt giant slimes with guildmates,
and engage in intense Guild PvP battles.
An ever-evolving world of massive contentâ€”
Your adventure begins now in Summoners War!

â—† Real-Time Global Strategy Battles
Real-time tactical duels that begin with Pick & Ban!
Engage others in Challenge Battle, where victory belongs to strategy with equally provided Monsters.
Compete in the World Arena, the pinnacle of strategic combat,
and prove your mastery on the global stage in the SWC (Summoners War World Championship)!

â—† Upgraded Growth and Farming Systems
Continuous updates now support faster progression for both new and returning Summoners!
Take on Summoner support quests and obtain guaranteed Nat 5 Monsters.
Enjoy improved farming rewards and less grind through the newly added Ameria's Luck and Scout Battle.
Grow with pace and dive straight into the vast world of Summoners War!

***
Device App Access Permission Notice
â–¶ Notice per access permission
Access permissions are requested in order for us to provide you with the following service when you use the app.

[Required]
None

[Optional]
- NOTIFICATION: The permission is required to receive info sent from the game app and advertisement push notifications.
- AUDIO: The permission is required to use the voice feature.
- STORAGE (Under OS 10.0): The permission is required to use the recording feature in the game.

â€» You'll be able to enjoy the service except features related to above authorities even if you don't give permission to the above.

â–¶How to remove access permissions
After allowing the access permission, you can revoke or modify the access permissions as follows:

[OS 6.0 and up]
Settings > Apps > Select the app > Permissions > allow or deny permissions

[Under OS 6.0]
Upgrade the OS to deny access permission or delete app

title: Tasty Travels: Merge Game
summary:
Tasty Travels

"Open your phone and join us on a journey around the culinary world!"
In "Tasty Travels", you get to travel the world while experiencing local cuisines, learning to make various specialty dishes, and sharing with friends from all corners of the globe! The most exciting part? You can combine two identical ingredients to create new exquisite dishes, reveling in the joy of cooking!

Unique Gameplay: Merge and Explore
Innovative Merging: Discover and merge identical ingredients during your journey, exploring new culinary secrets and enjoying the unique fun of merging!
Culinary Map: Experience over 500 types of local cuisines, each with its unique method of preparation and story!
Quest Challenges: Assist other tourists with their food requests to unlock more recipes and travel destinations!

Social Interaction and Sharing
Global Food Community: Meet friends from around the world in "Tasty Travels", share your culinary adventures, and earn their admiration!
Recipe Sharing: Exchange recipes, jointly appreciate the beauty of food, making your travel more colorful and diverse!

Travel Destinations
Unlock New Locations: Collect coins to unlock new travel destinations!
World's Famous Culinary Cities: Explore and experience dozens of the world's famous culinary cities, each with its unique flavor and culture!

title: Capybara Go!
summary:
Love capybaras so much you want to play as one? Get ready to embark on a whimsical adventure with a bunch of furry, feathery, fantastic friends!
Introducing the craziest capybara roguelike adventure RPG!
Dive into the world of capybaras with "CAPYBARA GO"!

- Your journey starts and ends with the capybara! Befriend it, bond with it, deck it out with the best gear and explore the wild!
- Endless adventures with randomized events, conquer the challenges ahead!
- Forge kindred bonds with other animal companions! Form alliances and face dangers together!
- Will you take the road off the beaten path or go the chaotic capybara route? Uncover hidden secrets with your capybara companion!

Victory or defeat depends entirely on your choices and luck (good, bad and ugly)!
CAPYBARA GO - A text-based roguelike RPG starring a capybara! Dive headfirst into bizarre adventures with some whismy, some irreverence, and a shovelful of good olâ€™ madness in this cute capy caper!

title: Lands of Jail
developer: SINGAPORE JUST GAME TECHNOLOGY PTE. LTD.
summary:
In a world plagued by rampant crime and deepening social divisions, you're dispatched to the Isle of the Banishedâ€”where criminals are banished far from civilizationâ€”and face the challenge of turning chaos into order.

Roll up your sleevesâ€”it's time to prove you're the Warden who can take charge!

As a Warden, Your Duties Include:
**Managing Prisoners**
You oversee every aspect of the prisoners' lives, from meal schedules to work assignments. Your strategic decisions are critical, affecting the balance between stability and turmoil.

**Tracking Fugitives**
With dangerous fugitives still on the loose, it's up to you to track them down and bring them back. Once arrested, these high-risk criminals can be put to work, helping you maintain order and efficiency within your facility.

**Ensuring Order and Profit**
Running a successful prison takes more than just muscleâ€”it takes a sharp mind too. Manage your budget wisely, upgrade your facilities, and turn a profit, all while keeping the prisoners in line and the operation running smoothly.

Show off your command skills and establish yourself as the ultimate authorityâ€”the Warden!

title: Genshin Impact
summary:
Step into Teyvat, a vast world teeming with life and flowing with elemental energy.

You and your sibling arrived here from another world. Separated by an unknown god, stripped of your powers, and cast into a deep slumber, you now awake to a world very different from when you first arrived.

Thus begins your journey across Teyvat to seek answers from The Seven â€” the gods of each element. Along the way, prepare to explore every inch of this wondrous world, join forces with a diverse range of characters, and unravel the countless mysteries that Teyvat holds...

MASSIVE OPEN WORLD

Climb any mountain, swim across any river, and glide over the world below, taking in the jaw-dropping scenery each step of the way. And if you stop to investigate a wandering Seelie or strange mechanism, who knows what you might discover?

ELEMENTAL COMBAT SYSTEM

Harness the seven elements to unleash elemental reactions. Anemo, Electro, Hydro, Pyro, Cryo, Dendro, and Geo interact in all sorts of ways, and Vision wielders have the power to turn this to their advantage.

Will you vaporize Hydro with Pyro, electro-charge it with Electro, or freeze it with Cryo? Your mastery of the elements will give you the upper hand in battle and exploration.

BEAUTIFUL VISUALS

Feast your eyes on the world around you, with a stunning art style, real-time rendering, and finely tuned character animations delivering you a truly immersive visual experience. Lighting and weather all change naturally over time, bringing every detail of this world to life.

SOOTHING SOUNDTRACK

Let the beautiful sounds of Teyvat draw you in as you explore the expansive world around you. Performed by the world's top orchestras such as London Philharmonic Orchestra and Shanghai Symphony Orchestra, the soundtrack changes seamlessly with the time and gameplay to match the mood.

BUILD YOUR DREAM TEAM

Team up with a diverse cast of characters in Teyvat, each with their own unique personalities, stories, and abilities. Discover your favorite party combinations and level up your characters to help you conquer even the most daunting of enemies and domains.

JOURNEY WITH FRIENDS

Team up with friends across various platforms to trigger more elemental action, tackle tricky boss fights, and conquer challenging domains together to reap rich rewards.

As you stand atop the peaks of Jueyun Karst and take in the rolling clouds and vast terrain stretching out before you, you may wish to stay in Teyvat a little longer... But until you are reunited with your lost sibling, how can you rest? Go forth, Traveler, and begin your adventure!

WANDER THE THOUSAND STARS, SHAPE MYRIADS OF WONDERLANDS

Enter Miliastra Wonderland â€” a dreamlike realm of adventure, creation, and socializing. Customize your Manekins, meet friends in the Lobby, tackle challenges in various stages, or craft your own unique worlds in the Miliastra Sandbox!

SUPPORT
If you encounter any issues during the game, you can send us feedback via the in-game Customer Service Center.
Customer Service Email: genshin_cs@hoyoverse.com
Official Site: https://genshin.hoyoverse.com/
Forums: https://www.hoyolab.com/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/genshinimpact/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GenshinImpact
YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/c/GenshinImpact
Discord: https://discord.gg/genshinimpact
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Genshin_Impact/

title: Hero Wars: Alliance
summary:
Become the hero leader and restore the Dominion to its former glory in one of the most epic battle games!

The Archdemon won. The Guardians have fallen, and many of them have turned into warriors of darkness. But hope still lives â€” Aurora broke free of his power. Now it's your turn to bring back the others!

Hero Wars: Alliance is a true gem among role play games â€” it's more than an RPG. It's a test of strategy, tactics, and resolve. Gather a team of Heroes, upgrade their skills, predict enemy moves, and lead your army to battle!

â€¢ FIND THE STRONGEST HERO COMBINATIONS
In Hero Wars: Alliance, there are more than 80 unique Heroes, each of them belonging to one of six factions: Chaos, Eternity, Honor, Mystery, Nature, and Progress. Each faction has its own characteristics and gameplay style. Learn Hero skills, find unexpected combinations, and exploit enemy weaknesses to turn the tide of battle!

Gather a balanced hero team, develop strategic tactics, and unlock the potential of your warriors to win in PvE challenges and PvP battles. Whether you're a fan of battle games or immersive role play games, you'll find a home in the Dominion!

â€¢ Dominate in the Battle Arena
Fight in PvP duels in the battle Arena, crush your rivals, and get to the top of the ranking! Challenge Heroes from all over the world and prove your battle prowess. Only the strongest deserve glory in this epic showdown.

â€¢ Compete in Legends Draft
Pick a team of random but fully leveled Heroes to win in this PvP battle mode. The player whose team gains the upper hand first wins. Legends Draft is all about tactics!

â€¢ Conquer PvE challenges
Face powerful bosses in the Tower, a multi-level dungeon where every victory earns you a buff for the next battle. Reach the top of the Tower and claim legendary rewards!

â€¢ Join a Guild
Create your own Guild or join an existing one! Take part in Guild Wars to get to the top league and prove your strength in the Clash of Worlds.

â€¢ Explore Adventures in a fantasy RPG
Embark on limited-time hero Adventures packed with thrilling stories and epic battles. Explore the fantasy RPG world of the Dominion, defeat bosses, and collect valuable loot!

â€¢ Take part in Titan Battles
Titans are formidable creatures wielding the power of elements. Summon Fire, Water, Earth, Air, and Dark Titans, engage in Titan Battles, and fight for victory in Guild Wars!

If you're looking for battle games full of tactical depth or role play games that test your leadership â€” look no further.

Are you ready for battle? Collect Heroes, master skills, and lead your team to victory in this idle RPG! Play online, conquer the Arena, and become a legend in Hero Wars: Alliance!

Hero Wars: Alliance Fantasy is a free to play game. However, some in-game items can also be purchased for real money, including loot boxes that drop available items in random order. You can find all information about drop rates by selecting a corresponding info button.

title: Trickcal:Chibi Go
summary:
Log in every day to claim 160 pulls and a guaranteed 3* Apostle Ticket!
â™¥ Set Off for the Irresistibly Cute World of Squeezy Cheeks! â™¥
Welcome to Elias, home of the Squeezy Cheeks!
A place where even if the kingdom explodes tomorrow, people will still be happily munching sweets like, "Eh, whatever."
Here, the one every Sprite calls "Born Leader!" is Lady Erpin... who, well, used to be... (she's currently being chased by rebels over a national sweets shortage.)
Anywayâ€”since you've somehow ended up as the head of Yggdrasil, it's time to rally your Apostles and start your adventure!

â–¶Big Cheeks, Bigger Cutenessâ—€
Squeeze those Squeezy Cheeks anytime, anywhere!
There's no problem a good cheek-squish can't fix. The more you squish, the better it feels!

â–¶10 Minutes a Day, Zero Burnoutâ—€
3 minutes of dailies + 7 minutes of cheek-squeezing = job done.
No grind, no stressâ€” nothing should come between you and those adorable cheeks!

â–¶ Laughs, Memes, and Total Mayhemâ—€
Trick or treatâ€”hand over the sweets!
Dive into a hilariously goofy story and experience the wacky daily life of the Squeezy Cheeks, all in a chill, feel-good vibe.

â–¶Chill, Build, and Skip Work Today â—€
Deck out your Order with cozy furniture, cute figures, and little maids.
Can't face another day at work? Escape into the world you built and play to your heart's content!

â–¶All-Star Japanese Voice Cast â—€
A full Japanese voiceover lineup featuring fan-favorite VAs!
Fully voiced episodes and over-the-top performances that pull you right into this absurd adventure. Let the show begin!

title: Ninja Must Die
summary:
[December 24 â€” Ninja Must Die 3rd Anniversary Celebration Starts!]

[3rd Anniversary Birthday Party! Full of Rewards and Surprises!]
1. Log in for 3 consecutive days to receive a SSR weapon and a SSR Ninja of your choice!
2. Log in for 30 consecutive days to get new wind ninja [Hayashiro] 10-Wish Amulet x2 & new wind weapon [Annihilation] 10-Wish Gold Key x2!
3. Complete in-game missions to earn the limited Anniversary skin: Toast to Peace - Hayashiro!

[December 24 â€” New Wind Ninja: Hayashiro Breaks the Wind to Descend]
"Come with me, go and create a new era!"
Top-tier Ninja Hayashiro joins the Ninja World as a brand-new character.
With clone attacks and multiple elemental skills, experience unprecedented combat excitement!
Step into the new era of Ninjas alongside Hayashiro!

[Hayashiroâ€™s Exclusive Wind Weapon: Annihilation â€” Available January 7]
Massive attack range + stun effect â€” no Boss can escape its strike!
Chain multiple slashes with explosive damage for devastating combos, perfectly complementing Hayashiroâ€™s ultimate skills!

[New Chapter 14 Story: The White Falcon Unleashed]
Have you heard the tale of the â€œFalconâ€?
The strongest Wind Ninja in the Ninja World earned the title Falcon, and Hayashiro is no exception.
What trials and sacrifices lie behind this legendary title?
What beliefs drive Hayashiroâ€™s path?
Experience the all-new Chapter 14 story, launching December 24, and witness his epic journey!

title: Homescapes
summary:
Welcome to Homescapes, a warm and cozy game from the famous Playrix Scapesâ„¢ series! Make match-3 combinations and turn every corner of your home into an inviting place to relax and have fun.

Solve puzzles, restore the interior room by room, and meet new friends in every chapter of the exciting storyline. Austin the butler is ready to welcome you to a world of incredible adventures!

Game features:
â— Original gameplay: make match-3 combinations and decorate your house while enjoying an exciting story!
â— Thousands of captivating levels with explosive power-ups, useful boosters, and cool elements.
â— Exciting events: embark on fascinating expeditions, compete against other players in different challenges, and win awesome prizes!
â— Unique rooms with original designs: from Austin's bedroom to a greenhouse.
â— Loads of fun characters: meet Austin's friends and your neighbors!
â— Adorable pets that will become your faithful companions!

Play with your Facebook friends, or make new friends in the game community!

Homescapes is free to play, but some in-game elements (including randomized items) can be purchased for real money.

A Wi-Fi or internet connection is not required to play.
*An internet connection is required to access competitions and additional features.

Do you like Homescapes? Follow us on social media!
https://www.facebook.com/homescapes
https://www.instagram.com/homescapes_mobile/

Need to report an issue or ask a question? Contact Player Support through the game by going to Settings > Help and Support. If you can't access the game, use the web chat by clicking the chat icon in the lower right corner of our website: https://playrix.helpshift.com/hc/en/14-homescapes/

Privacy Policy: https://playrix.com/privacy/index.html
Terms of Use: https://playrix.com/terms/index.html

title: Wizardry Variants Daphne
summary:
Wizardry Variants Daphne carries on the lineage of the classic RPG series, Wizardry. The portal to the labyrinth of despair, where even destruction is pleasure, has opened once again.

â–  Story
Once every 100 years, the Abyss opens.

It is a curse of death that consumes the continent. A Warlock who coveted Death, devoured people and animals and enveloped the world in despair.

Inheriting the power to seal the Abyss over generations, kings have continued to protect the kingdom from its curse.

But now, the king has vanished, and the world is being consumed by death, moment by moment.

Resistance itself is meaningless.
There is naught but to perish.

â–  Adventure with allies
Experience an adventure of your very own with unique allies based on combinations of classes and races.

â–  Difficulty with a bite
Perilous traps and mighty foes await in the dungeon. Take on a high difficulty that only Wizardry can offer.

â–  Intuitive Controls
Play a full 3D dungeon anytime, anywhere, with one hand on your upright smartphone.

â–  Cadre of renowned creators
Main Character Design: Yusuke Kozaki
Manga artist and illustrator; in addition to writing manga, he also does design work for anime and games, and is well known for the fine touches in his character designs.

Boss Monster Design: Katsuya Terada
His work, centered on manga and illustration, includes character designs video games and movies, as well as poster for theater productions.

Sound: Hitoshi Sakimoto
Has composed for more than 130 game titles of all genres. With their rich sound and epic scale, his scores have received tremendous support not only in Japan, but also from overseas.

â–  Magnificent cast brings the fully-voiced scenario to life
[English Voice Actors]
Lulunarde: Morgan Cambs
Pulgritte: Dev Joshi
Dylanhardt: Doug Cockle
Elmon: Laurence Bouvard
Vernant: Christopher Ragland
Pickerel: Alex Capon
Leaufonde: Garrick Hagon
Shagtis of Sorrow: Jay Rincon

- Other Voice Actors, etc. -
Beth Robb Adams, Mike Bodie, Sarah Borges, Davis Brooks, Shin-Fei Chen, Doug Cockle, Clare Corbett, Arlene Decker, Sarah Galbraith, Garrick Hagon, Arina Ii, Jules de Jongh, Dev Joshi, Samantha Kamras, Rae Lim,Elsie Lovelock, Meaghan Martin, Gianni Matragrano, Joseph May, Alexander McMorran, Eric Meyers, Sarah Pitard, Christopher Ragland, Matt Reeves, Jay Rincon, Cecily Bednar Schmidt, Kerry Shale, Martin T Sherman, Adam Sims, Ina Marie Smith, Colin Stinton, Alex Vincent, Alexandra Vincent, Glenn Wrage -- Other appearances (in alphabetical order)

[Japanese Voice Actors]
Lulunarde: Inori Minase
Pulgritte: Yui Ishikawa
Dylanhardt: Chikahiro Kobayashi
Elmon: Satomi Korogi
Vernant: Yoshimasa Hosoya
Pickerel: Junya Enoki
Leaufonde: Takaya Hashi
Shagtis of Sorrow: Takehito Koyasu

- Other Voice Actors, etc. -
Yutaka Aoyama, Masumi Asano, Koji Ishii, Maaya Uchida, Yu Kobayashi, Tetsuo Komura, Jiro Saito, Yu Shimamura, Yoko Soumi, Shinya Takahashi, Hiroki Takahashi, Yumi Toma, Yuichi Nakamura, Romi Park, Fairouz Ai, Shinshu Fuji, Takanori Hoshino, Anna Yamaki, Aoi Yuki -- Other appearances (in Japanese alphabetical order)

â– What is Wizardry?
Wizardry is a computer role-playing game released in the United States in 1981 with elements such as party organizing, labyrinth exploration, monster fighting, and character development having such a tremendous impact on the various RPGs that followed, that it is often referred to as the origin of RPGs. Numerous sequels have been released, and nearly 40 years after its release, it remains a timeless masterpiece that enjoys strong popularity around the world.

title: Township
summary:
BUILD YOUR DREAM TOWN!

Welcome to Township, a thrilling city-building and farming game where you become the mayor of your own town!
Build houses, factories, and community buildings, grow crops on your farm, and decorate your town just the way you like. Take part in limited-time events, compete in exciting regattas, and earn exclusive prizes!

Need a break from city planning? Jump into relaxing match-3 puzzles to earn rewards, speed up your progress, and unlock even more fun â€” all available offline!
Township â€” the perfect blend of city-building, farming, and match-3 gameplay!

GAME FEATURES:
â— Unlimited creativity: Design and build the metropolis of your dreams!
â— Engaging match-3 puzzles: Complete fun levels to earn rewards and boost your progress!
â— Exciting competitions: Test your skills against players from around the world in regular competitions â€” win prizes and make unforgettable memories!
â— Exclusive collections: Gather valuable artifacts, rare antiquities, and colorful profile pictures to showcase your achievements!
â— Offline play: Enjoy Township anytime, anywhere â€” even without an internet connection!
â— Vibrant community: Meet friendly characters with unique personalities!
â— Social connections: Play with your Facebook friends or make new friends in the Township community!

Why You'll Love Township:
â— A unique mix of city-building, farming, and match-3 gameplay!
â— Stunning graphics and charming animations
â— Regular updates with fresh content and special events
â— Personalize your town with a wide variety of decorations

Township is free to play, but some in-game items can be purchased for real money.

A Wi-Fi or internet connection is not required to play.
*An internet connection is required to access competitions and additional features.

Do you like Township? Follow us!
Facebook: facebook.com/TownshipMobile
Instagram: instagram.com/township_mobile/

Need to report an issue or ask a question? Contact Player Support through the game by going to Settings > Help and Support. If you can't access the game, use the web chat by clicking the chat icon in the lower right corner of our website: https://playrix.helpshift.com/hc/en/3-township/

Privacy Policy:
https://playrix.com/privacy/index.html
Terms of Use:
https://playrix.com/terms/index.html

title: Royal Match
summary:
Welcome to Royal Match, the king of puzzle games! Swipe colors, solve match-3 puzzles and help King Robert decorate his castle. An exciting adventure is calling you!

We have thousands of challenging match-3 levels for you to play in the Royal Arena! On this fun journey, you will solve exciting puzzles, receive coins for unlocking new areas, decorate King Robertâ€™s castle and get extra boosters to continue your saga. Also you can compete with millions of players in events such as King's Cup, Sky Race, Team Battle, Lightning Rush and claim exciting rewards for your achievements. Fun and challenge never ends and you will never have a dull moment in Royal Match.

And BOOM! It is 100% ad free and no wifi needed - internet free.

Jump into the adventure and play now! We have lots of sweet puzzles to enjoy. Each new episode comes with free coins, helpful boosters, surprising awards, challenging tasks and wonderful areas.

- A unique match 3 gameplay and fun levels for both masters and new match 3 players!
- Unlock and blast powerful boosters!
- Collect loads of coins and special treasures in bonus levels!
- Watch out for obstacles on the road such as birds, boxes, potions, cupboards, diamonds, magic hats, coin safes, mysterious mailboxes and piggy!
- Open amazing chests for a chance to win coins, boosters, unlimited life and power-ups!
- Explore the new rooms, royal chambers, splendid gardens, and many more exciting areas in King Robertâ€™s castle!
- Decorate the areas, including the Kingâ€™s room, kitchen, garden, garage, and many other amazing rooms!
- Challenge your friends on Facebook and reach the top of the leaderboards!

Download now and start swapping for endless fun.

Need some help? Visit our support page in the Royal Match app or send us a message at contact@dreamgames.com.

title: Busy Savior: Codex & Combat
summary:
[Busy Savior], a wacky tree-cutting RPG that tickles your funny bone and jogs your childhood memories. Dive in its diverse gameplay and rediscover the unique charm of games!

Look at this guy! He time traveled and stumbled upon a mysterious system. Overwhelmed by a flood of praises, he was forced into chores and errands. Luckily, you knew a bit of management and saved him from all those dirty work by hiring versatile generals to work for him. However, the System is asking for more. This time, you are required to save... the world?!

Game Features
[Wacky, Isn't It?]
A cute idle game loved by all! Retro vibe, zany art, unique characters, rich content... No more hesitation, come play with your friends!

[Assign Generals]
He who isn't versatile is not a good general. Chop trees, harvest wheat, make buns, train soldiers... Customize duty rosters and delegate to your heart's content!

[Unique Combos]
Explore unique lineups and unleash powerful combos. Levitate, repel, and topple enemies... Use your imagination and be the Brawl King!

[Innovative Gameplay]
Life is more than fighting and killing. It's time to unwind and spice it up! A zany alliance sports meet would just hit the spotâ€”roof surfing, sprint swimming... There's always something just for you!

[Join Alliances]
Meet like-minded gamers, create or join an alliance. Together, you shall embark on a thrilling Samkok journey. The vast world is out there for you to explore!

The game involves moderate violence and is rated for 12+ in accordance with app rating regulations.
*The game is free to play and provides in-game purchase that includes virtual currency, items, etc.
*Please plan your playtime and avoid addiction.
*MEBACK LTD. is the licensed agent of [Busy Savior] in Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan regions.
*To support the picture upload function in Moments, we may require players to upload pictures. Thank you for your understanding!
Company address: Taipei City

title: Top War: Battle Game
summary:
Commander, the Dark Legion is coming!

These Tyrants rule the world! Constant war, refugees scattered across the land and a world starved of hope. Who will liberate us? Become the strongest Commander and a fearless leader in the struggle against the legion, right alongside the freedom league! Merge to upgrade your power whether it's buildings, skills or units, if you can merge it, you can upgrade it!

- FEATURES -

Top War is an innovative strategy game featuring merge to upgrade gameplay, no more long upgrade waiting times, just merge two together and the upgrade will finish instantly! Recruit Legendary Heroes to lead the stationed Land, Navy and Airforce troops to victory! Upgrade heroes and troops with unique skills and equipment to lead all three armies to become immortal!

Start on a barren, deserted island and build an idyllic base to train your armies, improve your power and liberate the land. Strength doesn't come from just troops, and that's a good thing! Create a stylish yet formidable island with a variety of buildings and decorations at your disposal. Come and show-off your unique style!

Battle online with players from all over the world in a variety of game modes such as; Server v Server wars, Dark Forces, War Robots and weekly Capital Throne Showdowns all while experiencing the real battles with your alliance. Fight for glory, liberate the oppressed and dominate your enemies!


- PLEASE NOTE -

Top War: Battle Game is free-to-play and offers in-game purchases. Playing requires a network connection.

- FOLLOW US -

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Topwarbattlegame/
Discord: https://discord.gg/topwarbattlegameofficial

title: Seven Knights Re:BIRTH
summary:
â‰ª Game Introduction â‰«

Do you remember playing the original Seven Knights game with your friends?
Welcome to Seven Knights Re:BIRTH: a game that will fill you with the same thrill and emotions. Featuring:

â–¶ A [Refined Turn-Based Battle System]
Strategically set your team formation and skill order, and you're ready to go!
Sit back and watch the battle unfold!

â–¶ A [Bold Visual RPG] with the signature vibrance of the Seven Knights
Watch charming heroes unleash their skills before you; from the beautiful Lunar Slash to the breathtaking Meteor Wrecker.

Experience diverse cinematics from the [Seven Knights Hero Story]
See the colorful heroes like never before in new animations and illustrations.

â–¶ Play for FREE and farm Rubies to get opportunities to Summon [Daily Excitement]
Play to obtain Rubies and use them to summon heroes!
Enter a world of sustainable hero collecting: a true collectible RPG!

title: TFT: Teamfight Tactics
summary:
Put your team-building skills to the test in Teamfight Tactics, the multiplayer PvP auto battler from the studio behind League of Legends.

Bust out the big-brain strats as you draft, position, and fight your way to victory in an 8-way free-for-all battle. With hundreds of team combinations and an ever-evolving meta, any strategy goesâ€”but only one can win.

Master turn-based strategy and arena combat in epic auto battles. Queue up across a variety of chess-like social and competitive multiplayer modes, then outsmart and outlast your enemies to take your place at the top!

LORE & LEGENDS
Somewhere in the Convergence, a magical library holds a record of every moment that has shaped Runeterraâ€”and by discovering it, you have reawakened all the champions and conflicts within. Itâ€™s up to you to bring Runeterraâ€™s most iconic legends back to life!

Whether you rekindle past rivalries or honor old alliances, Lore & Legends features the largest roster of recruitable champions (100!) in any TFT set to date. And only you can decide whether things will play out true-to-history or reach other epic conclusionsâ€¦

While 60 champions are ready for the arena right from the start, you can only discover the remaining 40 Unlockable champions through in-game quests that tell their story. So get questing!

REPLAY LEGENDARY BATTLES
Draft a team of champions from a shared multiplayer pool.
Battle it out round by round to be the last Tactician standing.
Random drafts and in-game events mean no two matches play out exactly the same, so use your creativity and cunning to summon a winning strategy.

PICK UP AND GO
Challenge your friends and destroy your foes in turn-based battles across PC, Mac, and mobile.
Queue up together and find out if you and your friends have what it takes to come out on top.

RISE UP THE RANKS
Full competitive support and PvP matchmaking means there are countless ways to outplay your opponents.
From Iron to Challenger, auto battle your way up the ladder based on your final standing in every game.
A top-tier strategy might even earn you exclusive Ranked rewards at the end of every set!

REP YOUR REGION
Dive into battle with your favorite Chibi Champion or Little Legend!
Collect new looks just by playing games, or by purchasing them in the TFT store.

EARN AS YOU PLAY
Collect free loot with the Lore & Legends Pass, or upgrade to Pass+ to unlock even more rewards! Battle like the Ascended across the Shuriman Overlook Arena, crush your opponents with iron and fury using the Noxian Battering Ram, or raise anchor and take them down with the Set Sail boom.

Download and play Teamfight Tactics today!


Support: RiotMobileSupport@riotgames.com
Privacy Policy: https://www.riotgames.com/en/privacy-notice
Terms of Use: https://www.riotgames.com/en/terms-of-service

title: Wing Fighter
summary:
Still looking for a thrilling aerial shooting game? Launch into infinite possibilities with Wing Fighter!

Gameplay Features:
Dense Bullet Hell: Show off dazzling skills!
Massive Gear & Pilots: Mix and match to customize YOUR ultimate fighter!
Multiple Challenges: Fight for your Legion's glory!

Download Wing Fighter! Unleash Full Firepower! Liberate the Skies!

title: HappyFish
summary:
Welcome to Happy Fish!
ã€ŠHappy Fishã€‹â”€ The most popular and loving fish game! It has been installed over 60 million times worldwide.
ã€Over A Thousand Cute Fishã€‘
Over a thousand fish with remarkable personalities for you to choose. The cutie, the funky, the sweety, the geek, and so on..., no matter what their personalities are, you can have them all!
ã€Easy and Relaxingã€‘
Feed the fish, play with them, and trigger unexpected motion effects with only one touch! You can also get variety of treasures form your fish. Let the fish comfort you anytime and anywhere.
ã€Beautiful Backgroundsã€‘
Farmland, desert, outerspace, ocean, four seasons...and so on... There are a variety of backgrounds for you to choose. What's even better is that each background has its own music!
ã€Activities & Suprises Every Dayã€‘
Regularly updated with different activities and new fish. Experience loads of fun in one gameï¼
ã€Exciting Mini-gamesã€‘
Dr. Octopus, Goldã€Golden Dolphinã€Big Crabã€Sea Otter... etc. Let the pets bring joy to your fish bowl.
ã€Make Friends While Raising Fishã€‘
Visit your friends and maybe trick them a little bit, or you can feed their fish, pick up their fish's gems, and leave them messages...etc. Let's experience all the fun with your friends!
ã€Copyright Noticeã€‘
All content in this game is the property of Happy Elements, and is protected by international copyright laws.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Master Duel
summary:
Finally, the "Yu-Gi-Oh!" digital card game you've been waiting for!

The definitive edition of the competitive card game that has been evolving for over 25 years!
Duel at the highest level against Duelists from all over the world.

Get ready: it's time to Duel!

---------------------------------------------------------------

[About "Yu-Gi-Oh! MASTER DUEL"]
Fast-paced Duels with stunning HD graphics and a new, dynamic soundtrack! Get ready to challenge Duelists around the world!

â—‡Play Duels at Any Level!
The full Yu-Gi-Oh! experience is available for anyone at any Skill Level. Don't worry if you're a new player or if you haven't Dueled in a while, the in-game tutorials will teach you the basics on how to play the Yu-Gi-Oh! TRADING CARD GAME. You'll be given a Deck when you finish to help you start your journey!
Collect new cards as you progress through the game to power up your Decks!

â—‡Rotating Tournament Formats
Mix it up and put your Dueling skills to the test! A wide variety of events and tournaments will be available for players.
Build and Duel with different Decks utilizing 10,000+ unique cards and special rules unique to Tournaments!
Choose the tournament YOU want to Duel in and aim for that number one spot!

â—‡Uncover the Stories Behind the Cards
The Solo Mode guides you through storylines of the themes from the Yu-Gi-Oh! TCG. Hone your Dueling skills by completing the stories.
Recommended for beginners, returning players, and those of you who are interested in learning more about the lore of the world of the Yu-Gi-Oh! TCG

â—‡Features
Link with the mobile app "Yu-Gi-Oh! Neuron."
View Decklists from Duelists worldwide and improve your own Deck!
Try the sample draw feature to simulate what cards you could get in your first hand!

[About "Yu-Gi-Oh!"]
"Yu-Gi-Oh!" is a popular manga created by Kazuki Takahashi that was serialized in SHUEISHA Inc.'s "WEEKLY SHONEN JUMP" since 1996. Konami Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. provides a Trading Card Game (TCG) and console games, based on "Yu-Gi-Oh!"created from the original manga, that has been enjoyed around the world.

[Recommended for the following players]
TCG players
Yu-Gi-Oh! DUEL LINKS players
Players who enjoy competitive gameplay

---------------------------------------------------------------

This game contains in-game purchases of virtual currencies used for gaining in-game items at random.

=====

[System Requirements]
Supported OS version: Android 7.0 and above
Supported device: Device with 4GB of RAM
Please note that even if your device fulfills the system specification required to run the application, it may not run properly due to external factors, such as available memory, conflicts with other applications, or hardware limitations.

title: Fishdom
summary:
Dive into the fantastic world of Fishdom! You're in for an ocean of exciting levels, scores of adorable fish and pets, and a sea of captivating events!

Explore incredible underwater adventures! Unlock aquariums and decorate them to your taste, creating perfect homes for cute fish and their friends.

Game Features:
â— Original gameplay: beat match-3 levels to create the perfect home for your fish!
â— Thousands of captivating levels with powerful boosters!
â— Loads of beautiful decorations and unlimited creative freedom: what the aquariums look like is entirely up to you!
â— Exciting events: embark on expeditions, collect keys in season adventures, and get awesome rewards like power-ups, boosters, unlimited lives, pets, and aquarium decorations!
â— Have fun together: compete against other players, team up, and win fantastic prizes! Play with your Facebook friends, or make new friends in the game community!

Fishdom is free to play, but some in-game elements (including randomized items) can be purchased for real money.

A Wi-Fi or internet connection is not required to play.
*An internet connection is required to access competitions and additional features."

Do you like Fishdom? Follow us!
Facebook: facebook.com/Fishdom
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fishdom_mobile/

Need to report an issue or ask a question? Contact Player Support through the game by going to Settings > Help and Support. If you can't access the game, use the web chat by clicking the chat icon in the lower right corner of our website: https://playrix.helpshift.com/hc/en/4-fishdom/

Privacy Policy:
https://playrix.com/privacy/index.html

Terms of Use:
https://playrix.com/terms/index.html

title: Play Together
summary:
Log in and start making friends with various people from all over the world in Play Together!

â— Create a character that is uniquely you and make all kinds of friends.
Customize your character from head to toe in your unique style. The possibilities are endless with a variety of skin tones, hairstyles, body types, and costumes to choose from. Maybe, you'll find that special someone in your life as you chat with and befriend various people from around the world!

â— Turn your humble abode into the home of your dreams and invite friends over for a Home Party!
Choose a house from a wide range of styles and concepts and a countless number of furniture pieces to make your dream home fantasy a reality right before your eyes. Invite friends over or visit their homes to catch fish, play games, chit-chat, and role-play together for hours of fun!

â— Have a blast playing fun-filled minigames with friends.
Demonstrate your mad gaming skills in minigames such as Game Party, where the last one standing from 30 players wins, Zombie Virus, Obby Race, Tower of Infinity, Fashion Star Runway, Snowball Fight, Sky High, as well as an assortment of additional minigames found only in school.

â— Go around various fishing spots to catch new species of fish and show them off to others!
Catch over 600 species of fish in places such as a pond, the sea, and even a swimming pool. It's never a dull moment as new fish to catch are constantly added to the game. Every fishing spot has fish not found in other spots, so visit them all to complete the collections listed in the Illustrated Book and show people what you've caught!

â— Catch insects and lizards with your friends in various locations or go excavate rare ores and fossils.
Over 300 species of insects are thriving throughout the in-game world! Also, look forward to a unique and fun experience digging up dinosaur fossils and rare diamonds. Sell your findings directly or show off your accomplishments to your friends by beautifully displaying them for double the satisfaction.

[Please Note]
* Although Play Together is free, the game contains optional in-app purchases that may incur additional charges. Please note that refund of in-app purchases may be restricted depending on circumstance.
* For our usage policy (including policy on refunds & termination of service), please read the Terms of Service listed in the game.

â€» Use of illegal programs, modified apps, and other unauthorized methods to access the game may result in service restrictions, removal of game accounts and data, claims for compensation of damages, and other remedies deemed necessary under the Terms of Service.

[Official Community]
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PlayTogetherGame/
* For game-related queries:support@playtogether.zendesk.com

â–¶About App Access Permissionsâ—€
In order to provide you with game services listed below, the app will ask you for permission to grant access as follows.

[Required Permissions]
Access to Files/Media/Photos: This allows the game to save data on your device, and to store any gameplay footage or screenshots you take within the game.

[How to Revoke Permissions]
â–¶ Android 6.0 and above: Device Settings > Apps > select app > App Permissions > grant or revoke permission
â–¶ Below Android 6.0: Upgrade your OS version to revoke the access permissions as above, or delete the app

â€» You can revoke your permission for the app to access game files from your device by following the instructions above.
â€» If you are using a device which runs below Android 6.0, you will not be able to set permissions manually, so we recommend that you upgrade your OS to Android 6.0 or higher.

[Caution]
Revoking the required access permissions may prevent you from accessing the game and/or cause termination of game resources that are running on your device.

title: BLEACH: Soul Resonance
summary:
The officially authorized action game of [BLEACH] - [BLEACH:Soul Resonance] is now online!

Join us and step into the Soul Society. Experience the passion and romance as you unleash Bankai with your fingertips, and fight with your Zanpakuto by your side. Immerse yourself in a story-driven experience that stays true to the heartfelt tales of [BLEACH]. Enjoy innovative blade clashes and unleash dazzling skills. Engage in fast-paced combat, where victory can be decided in an instant. Unite your companions for the cause of protection â€” with your favorite characters guaranteed every 80 draws, and unleash powerful combo attacks with seamless character switches.

â–  [BLEACH] Officially Authorized
This title is officially authorized by [BLEACH] and supervised by the [BLEACH] Production Committee
It aims to deliver a faithful recreation of the classic series, igniting your youthful passion!

â–  Immersive Storyline â€” A True-to-the-Heart Adaptation
Dive into an immersive story that places you right in the heart of [BLEACH]'s action-packed world! Every clash of the blades, every strike, every story, and every iconic line is crafted with genuine passion and care â€” all to bring you face-to-face with the Soul Reapers, right at your fingertips!

â–  Innovative Blade-Clashing Gameplay â€” Victory Decided in an Instant
Fight side-by-side with your Zanpakuto! Where your fingers move, the blade follows. Experience innovative blade-clashing gameplay for an unparalleled battle thrill!
Each Zanpakuto comes with tailored feedback, making every slash feel realistic and putting you in the heart of the battle. In the lightning dance of attack and defense, victory is decided in a split second. Enjoy the mastery of motion at its finest.

â–  Seamless Character Switching â€” Synergistic Combos
Forge victory through bonds, dig into the skills, weave versatile lineups to bend the war to your will for relentless damage. Seamlessly switch between characters and unleash the combos. Experience the multi-dimensional improvement to combat! Where blades crown the field, march with your comrades and fight side by side!

â–  Unite for the Cause of Protection â€” Assemble Iconic Characters
With an 80-draw guarantee, you're bound to get your favorite characters. Now, with trusted allies and teammates by your side, let's raise your blade in the sacred name of protection!

More information about BLEACH : Soul Resonance , please followï¼š

title: Cell Survivor
summary:
Embark on an epic adventure in Cell Survivor, a tactical RPG game that tests your survival skills in intense microscopic battles within survival games. ğŸš€ Dive into the vast cellular universe and strategically defeat unpredictable virus bosses with precision, quick reflexes, and tactical prowess in this roguelike RPG. Gear up to unleash your inner warrior in one of the most exhilarating RPG survival games crafted to date among top tower defense games!

ğŸ® Gameplay:
Progress through Cell Survivor, a challenging survival games, facing off against increasingly challenging virus bosses that demand sharp combat tactics and strategic foresight. Each boss is like a complex puzzle, with distinct weak spots requiring precise strikes for successful takedowns in role playing games. Targeting these critical areas not only repels your foes but also boosts your arsenal of tactical equipment. This roguelike RPG lets you tailor your combat style uniquely in each battle by choosing from three dynamically generated skills that enhance your capabilities in real-time for roguelike gameplay.

Your strategic choices in skill upgrades are crucialâ€”they refine your current battle strategies and lay groundwork for upcoming challenges with solo leveling. Whether you opt for overpowering strength or tactical stealth, your fighting style will evolve based on solo leveling and tactical decisions you make under pressure. Picture Cell Survivor as a game of chess, but with bio-warfare elements where every move solo leveling your character towards mastery in cell environments.

ğŸŒŸ **Game Features**:
1. Challenging Virus Bosses: Each virus boss in Cell Survivor exhibits unique behaviors and vulnerabilities. Mastering their patterns and capitalizing on their weaknesses is essential to dominate the game in survival games. ğŸ¯
2. Roguelike Skill Choices: Embodying the core of both roguelike and role playing games genres, Cell Survivor provides a plethora of skills that cater to your strategic choices for roguelike RPG. This diversity guarantees that no two playthroughs are alike, offering limitless replayability and varied tactical engagements in tower defense style. âš”ï¸
3. Diverse Levels: The game levels in Cell Survivor range vastly in terms of difficulty and required strategic approaches, necessitating the discovery of the most effective skill combinations to triumph quickly in role playing games with cell challenges.

Whether you are an experienced survival games enthusiast seeking a new challenge or a newcomer drawn to the unique combination of strategic depth and solo leveling in role playing games, Cell Survivor delivers a heart-racing experience from beginning to end. Step into the role of a microscopic hero navigating a vast and hostile cell environment. With its unique mix of roguelike gameplay and RPG depth, surviving in Cell Survivor means not just enduring but thriving and making your mark in the cell cosmos! ğŸŒŒ

Gear up for a distinctive survival games and RPG experience. Hone your skills in this cell survivor journey, strategize your pathway in cell-based battles, and dominate the microscopic realm in roguelike survival! The journey of a cell survivor starts now in cell survival. Are you prepared to thrive in the cell universe? ğŸ›¡ï¸

title: Ragnarok X: Together
summary:
The new main server, Link Region, launches on November 24! New classes, new maps, new servers, plus tons of rewards going live together!
A new beginning, a new journey! To all Adventurers old and newâ€”come, unite once more, and step boldly into a brand-new era of adventure!
Officially authorized by Gravity from South Korea! A fresh take on the classic masterpiece! Adventurers, let's embark on your own fantasy journey of the next generation!

======Game Features======
â—† New Classâ€”Soul Linker
Twin souls dance as one, united beyond boundaries
Shatters all boundaries with dual forms, offering a new combat experience

â—† New Lv.160 Mapâ€”Lighthalzen
Reborn from the wasteland, with new MVP and MINI monsters awakened
Major update on Main City - Rachel, along with the new enchantment feature

â—† New Main Server - Link Region Goes Live on November 24
Connect with Adventurers all over the world
Exclusive new server events and Hyper Return

â—† Cross-Server Trading, Market Never Sleeps
The Exchange Center is now fully connectedâ€”the pulse of commerce beats 24/7
Tons of events and rewards await to boost your return

â—† Stay True, Let's Adventure Together
Recreating the massive PC world in 3D, with loads of stories for you to explore!
Everything from Prontera to sea islands, the Midgard continent is all yours to unlock!
â€»This is a F2P game with in-game currency and item purchases. Please spend wisely based on your interest and budget.

======Contact Us======
Official Website: http://www.ragnarokx.com
Facebook Fans Group: https://www.facebook.com/RagnarokXNextGeneration
Customer Service: cs@roxnextgeneration.com

title: Empires & Puzzles: Match-3 RPG
summary:
Empires & Puzzles is a completely new take on match-3 puzzle games, combining RPG elements, PvE quests, and base-building â€” topped off with epic PvP duels that range from riveting 1v1 Raids to rambunctious 100v100 Wars.

Start your fantasy adventure today!

â€¢ Solve match-3 puzzles

Lead your army to victory by matching colorful shields and unleashing epic combos! This isn't your everyday gem game â€” matching tiles will not only deal damage to your enemies, but also charge powerful spells that you can fire at the right time to devastating effect. Setting off dream cascades will allow you to take down even the most powerful of dragons!

â€¢ Explore 5 full seasons of content â€” plus many dozens of mythical quests

Prepare for an epic match-3 adventure that will take you through all sorts of worlds for a genuine RPG experience! Will your team be strong and sturdy enough to sail stormy seas, fend against underworld monsters, crawl through sandy dungeons, and slay titanic dragons â€” while also making tons of new friends along the way?

â€¢ Amazing graphics

This puzzle RPG is set in a beautifully rendered fantasy world â€” you'll marvel at the stunning details of countless monsters, dragons, and other fantasy creatures! Your heroes' powerful magic spells will not only dazzle your eyes but also dramatically turn the tides of wars.

â€¢ Base-building

Rebuild the ruins of a mighty castle and turn it into your own war fortress! A finely built Stronghold will provide all the tools you need to farm resources, level up armies, research special recipes, and harness the magic power of gems to alchemically merge various items.

â€¢ Farming, crafting, upgrading

Make sure your team is well-prepared for all the adventures out there! Level up your castle and gather valuable resources â€” such as Dragon Bones and Meteor Fragments â€” to craft legendary weapons that will help your heroes make it through even the toughest dungeons!

â€¢ Hero card collection

Hundreds of legendary heroes and dozens of mighty troops await collection â€” summon new allies to bolster your team and unlock new strategy options! Each hero comes with their own unique stats and skills â€” find your own way to merge & match their strengths to victory.

â€¢ Train and dress up

Unlike in ordinary hero card games, you can level up your "deck" of heroes â€” and even evolve their power further by equipping them with costumes that add to their power! The vast fantasy world of Empires & Puzzles will present a wide array of challenges; you'll want to build an army that can tackle any epic match-3 duel this puzzle game throws your way.

â€¢ Go on online raids for great loot

Clash blades â€” and spells â€” in intense match-3 RPG battles with other empires! Whether you're raiding enemy castles to plunder resources, setting up defenses for your own fort, or going to war together with your Alliance for a real-time puzzle RPG experience, proving your mettle in PvP duels will grant you great rewards that can't be found in regular dungeons.

â€¢ Play together

Joining an Alliance to team up with like-minded players will enrich your experience by a thousandfold! Strong bonds will naturally form and evolve once you start playing together â€” whether it be fighting epic titans, covering for each other in multiplayer wars, exploring treacherous islands full of monsters, or speedrunning dungeons to unlock better loot for the gang.

Start building your Empire now â€” the villagers of your new Stronghold await!

Follow us:
http://www.empiresandpuzzles.com

Empires & Puzzles is FREE to download and includes optional in-game purchases (including random items). Information about drop rates for random item purchases can be found in-game. If you wish to disable in-game purchases, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tabletâ€™s Settings.
