title: Lords Mobile: tokidoki GO!
summary:
Lords Mobile is collaborating with tokidoki! Come get exclusive Skins, Decorations, Emotes, Avatars, and more!

Are you ready for a REAL fight?

The true Emperor has fallen. We need a real hero, a true Lord who can unite the Kingdoms. Recruit heroes from various backgrounds, from dwarves and mermaids to dark elves and steampunk robots, and assemble your army in this magical world! Fight and conquer to establish your empire in the strategy games!

[Game Features]:

â–¶â–¶ Embark on the Guild Expedition â—€â—€
Experience a grand Guild vs Guild battle, where multiple guilds compete against each other to expand their territory. Troops will not perish in this special battleground, allowing you to unleash your full potential without any worries! Unite your guild and strategize to conquer the battlefield!

â–¶ â–¶ Collect Artifacts! â—€â—€
Discover ancient Artifacts in the Artifact Hall. Upgrade and enhance them to unlock their true power!

â–¶ â–¶ Build Your Own Kingdom â—€â—€
Upgrade buildings, conduct research, train your troops, level your Heroes and lead your Kingdom well to prosper in this strategy game!

â–¶ â–¶ Utilize Troop Formations â—€â—€
4 different troop types, and 6 different troop formations for you to choose from! Plan your lineups, take advantage of the counter system, and pair your troops with the right Heroes! Perfect your strategy to defeat your enemies!

â–¶ â–¶ Powerful Heroes Await â—€â—€
Create a strong team of 5 Heroes to fight through an RPG-style campaign! Let them lead your kingdom to glory as war generals!

â–¶ â–¶ Forge Alliances â—€â—€
Join a guild to fight alongside your allies! Ride into war together to conquer various exhilarating events: Guild Wars, Kingdom Versus Kingdom battles, Battle Royals, Wonder Wars, Darknest Invasions, and much more!

â–¶ â–¶ Clash Online with Global Players â—€â—€
Brawl with millions of players from all over the world, and defeat those who stand in your way! Seize the throne and rule over all in this amazing strategy game!

â–¶ â–¶ Animated Battles â—€â—€
Experience the thrill of war as your armies clash in beautiful 3D graphics! Watch as your Heroes unleash their skills and harness their mystical power!


===Information===
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@lordsmobile_official
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/lordsmobile
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LordsMobile
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/LordsMobile

Note: This game requires an internet connection to play.

Customer Service: help.lordsmobile.android@igg.com

title: Rising: War for Dominion
summary:
Join our Real Time medieval strategy war game. Train your troops, Build your castle,recruit legendary heroes and join allies in our empire forge gameï¼Œ

** Game Features **
[Build Your Castle ]
Build your empires, upgrade your facilities, research your technologies, train your troops and recruit powerful heroes to strengthen your castle!

[Explore an Unknown World]
Explore a world shrouded in dense fog, with herds of enemies, abandoned gold mines, and various battlefields, all waiting for your discovery! Build a powerful kingdom through your strategy,find all resources

[Recruit Legendary Heroes]
Recruit legendary heroes to join your team, start your own age of empire buildings, and upgrade your heroes. They will defend the territory at all costs, lead your army into battles against other enemies, win all battles for the kingdomâ€™s rise, and become the lord of all kings!

[Defend the Kingdom, Fight for Glory]
The battle has begun! Now the glorious task of defending the kingdom falls on you! You will experience intense conflicts of civilization. fight for your beliefs!

title: DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE
summary:
DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE is the one of the best DRAGON BALL mobile game experiences available. This DB anime action puzzle game features beautiful 2D illustrated visuals and animations set in a DRAGON BALL world where the timeline has been thrown into chaos, where DB characters from the past and present come face to face in new and exciting battles! Experience the new story and save the world of DRAGON BALL!

DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE features a super refreshing and simplistic approach to the anime action genre! The epic anime-like battles feature simple yet addictive gameplay. Link Ki spheres during battle to attack your foes! Take your time and play at your own pace, itâ€™s the perfect DB game to play on the go wherever you are! When you are ready and powered up, finish your enemies with powerful Super Attacks such as Super Saiyan Gokuâ€™s Kamehameha and many more to send enemies flying!

All of your favorite characters are here from all your favorite DRAGON BALL anime series! From DBZ to DBS, everyoneâ€™s favorite Saiyan, Goku and his friends are ready to battle Frieza, Cell, Beerus, Jiren, and more! Summon your favorite DB characters and create the ultimate dream team(s)! Train and Awaken DB characters to power them up!

Help return order to the DRAGON BALL timeline through Quest mode. Experience reimagined popular anime stories with DB characters new and old. Play in Dokkan Events and the World Tournament and face off against tough enemies! And for true hardened fighters, the challenges of Extreme Z-Battle and Super Battle Road await!

SIMPLE ADDICTING GAMEPLAY
â€¢ Featuring a new take on the action puzzle game genre
â€¢ Tap and link Ki Spheres to attack and enter Dokkan Mode to finish foes!!
â€¢ Play at your own pace, planning your battle strategy is key

FINISH FOES WITH SUPER ATTACKS
â€¢ Collect enough Ki Spheres to activate Super Attacks just like the anime
â€¢ From Gokuâ€™s Iconic Kamehameha attack to Vegetaâ€™s Final Flash, all your favorites are here
â€¢ Experience them all in epic 2D illustrations and animations

YOUR FAVORITE DRAGON BALL CHARACTERS ARE HERE
â€¢ From DBZ to DBS, many popular DB characters are available
â€¢ Summon new and classic favorites such as Super - Saiyan God SS Goku, Vegeta, Krillin or rivals such as Frieza, Cell, Beerus, and Jiren plus more from the popular anime series

FORM YOUR TEAM OF POWERFUL WARRIORS
â€¢ Organize your DRAGON BALL team and create the strongest fighting force!
â€¢ Train your favorite DB characters and Awaken them to new realms of power!

A NEW DRAGON BALL STORY
â€¢ Bring order to the DRAGON BALL timeline
â€¢ Play the board game-style map and all-new story with your favorite Dragon Ball characters!
â€¢ Experience reimagined stories with DB characters new and old

Are you ready to go even further beyond? Download one of the best DRAGON BALL experiences available with DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE today for free!

summary:

The seal on the oven has broken.
Join GingerBrave and his friends on their epic journey to save the Pancake Tower from evil!

Clear stages to earn sweet equipment and join the Cookies on their adventure as they learn the secrets of what threatens the peace inside the magical tower!

title: Diablo Immortal
summary:
UPDATE - NEW CHARACTER CLASS
Unleash the beast with a new character class! Play as a Druid, a legendary shapeshifting guardian, where you can wield elemental forces and transform into an all-powerful werebear or werewolf.

SLAY YOUR WAY WITH ENDLESS CUSTOMIZATION

Choose from 9 iconic classes and build your legend as a Barbarian, Blood Knight, Crusader, Demon Hunter, Druid, Monk, Necromancer, Tempest, or a Wizard.

Customize your heroâ€™s appearance, abilities, and gear. Whether you favor up-close brutality or ranged precision, Diablo Immortal adapts to your playstyle.

THE BATTLE BEGINS HERE
Descend into darkness as the once peaceful world of Sanctuary has been torn apart by the Eternal Conflict between angels and demons. It needs a hero. It needs YOU.

Diablo Immortal, the definitive mobile MMORPG in the Diablo saga, casts you as humanity's last hope against impending chaos and evil.

Step into the armor of a battle-hardened warrior and experience exceptional action RPG gameplay on your phone or tablet, anytime, anywhere. Diablo Immortal offers epic quests, thrilling battles, and a compelling dark fantasy narrative â€” all the while delivering nonstop combat, deep progression, and endless ways to play.

Assemble your allies and embark on your journey of destiny now.

EVER-EVOLVING ACTION RPG COMBAT
Designed and expanded for mobile, Diablo Immortal delivers visceral combat with tight controls and precision. Engage in real-time battles across solo and multiplayer modes.

â—Â Â Â Â  Responsive movement and attacks
â—Â Â Â Â  Fluid combat optimized for touch or controller
â—Â Â Â Â  Raid bosses, clear dungeons, or dive into PvP

A LIVING SANCTUARY
Sanctuary is not a static world â€” it evolves, breathes, and attacks at any given moment. Discover haunted ruins, twisted forests, and lost civilizations through constantly updated content and dynamic Zone Events.

â—Â Â Â Â  Massive world bosses and seasonal challenges
â—Â Â Â Â  Rich environmental storytelling inspired by Diablo lore
â—Â Â Â Â  New settings like the ancient forests of the Sharval Wilds

THE POWER OF COMMUNITY
Alone or with others, Diablo Immortal offers a true MMORPG experience. Join forces, trade, fight, and ascend with players from around the world.

â—Â Â Â Â  Create Warbands for small-group synergy
â—Â Â Â Â  Join Clans to dominate leaderboards and unlock shared benefits
â—Â Â Â Â  Cooperate in raids, defend your territory, or test your skill in PvP arenas


CORE FEATURES
â—Â Â Â Â  True Action RPG Combat â€“ Experience visceral ARPG gameplay with fluid, real-time PvP and co-op battles.
â—Â Â Â Â  Massive Open-World MMORPG â€“ Explore shared zones, complete events, and encounter other players in a living Sanctuary.
â—Â Â Â Â  Build and Optimize Your Hero â€“ Deeply customize your hero from 9 classes through gear, skills, and playstyle, driven by loot-based progression.
â—Â Â Â Â  Multiplayer Raids and PvP Arenas â€“ Participate in multiplayer raids for challenging dungeon runs and test your abilities in structured PvP arenas.

FORGED BY FIRE
Diablo Immortal is more than a mobile game â€” itâ€™s a continuation of a saga that has captivated players for years. With AAA quality, expansive lore, and ever-evolving gameplay, this is Diablo as youâ€™ve never experienced it before.

The war for Sanctuary has begun. Download now and become a legend.

title: DRAGON BALL LEGENDS
summary:
The ultimate anime action RPG is here! DRAGON BALL LEGENDS puts the power of your favorite DRAGON BALL heroes in your hands! Epic 3D visuals and animations bring your heroes to life: More than 400 fighters to find and train to make your ultimate team ready for battle. Goku, Vegeta, Trunks, Piccolo, Frieza, Broly, Majin Buu and many other heroes and villains are waiting for you! Discover a new original story based on the brand-new character designed by manga creator Akira Toriyama, the mysterious Saiyan known as Shallot! Join Shallot and your favorite DRAGON BALL characters to help save the world!

DRAGON BALL LEGENDS features action-packed anime action RPG gameplay. With intuitive fighting controls and simple card-based strategic gameplay, presented in stunning 3D animation & visuals, DRAGON BALL LEGENDS brings the anime to life on your mobile device!

From great heroes such as Goku, Gohan, Piccolo and Krillin, to evil villains such as Frieza, Cell, and Majin Buu, all of your favorite anime DB characters are ready for battle! Summon characters from popular DRAGON BALL anime series, such as DBZ, DBGT, to DBS!

Enjoy 1 on 1 fighting action against your friends or rivals from across the globe in live PvP battles! Play casual battles with your friends or enter competitive Ratings Matches to earn points and rewards.

EPIC ACTION GAMEPLAY
â€¢ Control your favorite DRAGON BALL fighters in engaging 3D action gameplay
â€¢ Dodge your opponent in real time, counter attacks, use your ability cards, and build amazing combos!
â€¢ Fill DRAGON BALL slots during battle to trigger the powerful team based Rising Rush attack

ENTER THE WORLD OF DRAGON BALL
â€¢ Classic anime action recreated with high-quality 3D characters and stages
â€¢ Smooth character animations feature modern takes on iconic special moves
â€¢ Play through classic DRAGON BALL Sagas from the anime series

AN ORIGINAL ANIME STORYLINE
â€¢ Play as the all new character designed by manga creator Akira Toriyama!
â€¢ Experience a new adventure with Goku and all your favorite characters
â€¢ Enjoy voice acting from the original anime cast

SUMMON ICONIC DB CHARACTERS
â€¢ Popular characters from DBZ, DBGT, DBS anime series are here for you to collect
â€¢ From Gokuâ€™s Super Saiyan forms, to Frieza, Bulma, Beerus, Whis, Trunks, and Gohan, many fan favorites join this anime action RPG
â€¢ Create the ultimate DRAGON BALL party for battle

Are you ready to become a legend? Download the ultimate DB anime action RPG experience with DRAGON BALL LEGENDS today!

title: LINE Bubble 2
summary:
Shoot! Pop! Bubbles?!ã€€
Fresh, fun, and unique shooting puzzles!

LINE GAME's hallmark bubble shooting game!
Brown and Cony will invite you to go on a fun adventure!

â– Game Story
Brown set out on an adventure and disappeared.
After a long journey to find Brown, Cony finally found his pocket watch!
Just then, a red dragon suddenly appeared and dragged Cony into the mysterious world inside the watch.
Believing the dragon's words that Brown is waiting for Cony to solve the final mystery, Cony continues forward, unraveling the mysteries of the bubbles as she goes!

â– How to Play
- Throw bubbles and match three or more of the same type to pop them!
- Continuing the combo brings out special Bomb bubbles!
- Clear stages by completing the specified missions before running out of bubbles!

â– Main Features
- Thousands of various stages from a simple level to hard and super hard difficulty levels!
- All kinds of gimmicks updated in each episode!
- Enjoy various types of maps where you need to collect Bubbles, where you have a time limit, where you need to rescue friends, etc.
- Meet powerful boss monsters, too!
- Also! Check out a mode where you can compete in the Rankings with game friends!
- Exchange Flames with other Club members and enjoy Club-exclusive content!
- Take part in tie-up events that are held on a regular basis and get limited tie-up Buddies!

â– Good Things About Bubble 2
- Regardless of OSes, you can play Bubble 2 on mobile phones or tablets!
- It's not just a simple game! It's also recommended for someone who wants to play shooting puzzles for brain training or to feel a sense of accomplishment!
- You can play this bubble shooting game for free!
- Brown, Cony, and a lot more popular LINE FRIENDS characters appear in the game!
- It's not just the usual match 3 game. It's a shooting bubble style!

Come and play this bubble shooting game now!

title: Zombie Waves
summary:
Embark on a doomsday survival saga in the dystopian wasteland of "Zombie Waves," where waves of relentless undead zombies are a constant threat. In this 3D roguelike shooting game, navigate through a post-apocalyptic nightmare, survive against impossible odds, and master the art of zombie shooting. Upgrade your guns and learn survivor skills to confront the never-ending tide of zombies in this ultimate zombies game. Decipher the outbreak's mysteries and stand as the last beacon of hope for humanity in a world ravaged by the zombie invasion.

GAMEPLAY FEATURES

EASY-PLAY EXPERIENCE
Â·Effortless One-Handed Controls: Enjoy smooth combat with simple one-handed controls. Ideal for stress-free, yet captivating play.
Â·Auto-Aim Precision: Experience streamlined gameplay with an auto-aim feature, ensuring every shot counts.
Â·Quick Play Sessions: Perfect for breaks, with game rounds lasting 6-12 minutes.
Â·Idle Gameplay: Earn rewards even when you're offline with the AFK mechanics.

RPG PROGRESSION SYSTEM
Â·Strategic Hero Play: Select from an array of unique heroes, each boasting distinct abilities. Combine weapons and skills to carve your path to dominance.
Â·Robot Companions: Enhance your combat capabilities with customizable robot sidekicks.
Â·Diverse Equipment: Amass a variety of gear to bolster your arsenal and overcome new challenges.

INTENSE COMBAT EXPERIENCE
Â·Roguelike Skill Synergy: Over 100 roguelike skills and powerful ultimate abilities offer a unique combat dance every time.
Â·Immersive Battlefields: Engage in heart-pounding survival across varied stages. Use the terrain to your advantage and gain the upper hand.
Â·Spectacular Combat Effects: Enjoy the exhilarating sensation of full-screen eliminations with stunning visual effects.
Â·Mowing Down Hordes: Face overwhelming waves of monsters in exhilarating, large-scale battles.

DIVERSE GAME MODES
Â·Formidable Boss Foes: Confront a variety of grotesque bosses, each presenting a unique tactical challenge.
Â·Competitive & Co-op Modes: Dive into both competitive battles and cooperative play, adding more strategy and fun.
Â·Intriguing Sub-Game Modes: Explore various play styles, including roguelike tower climbs, survival modes, vehicle racing, and more.
Â·Camp Building: Build and customize your home base, adding more depth to your survival adventure.

Are you ready to face the endless zombie hordes in "Zombie Waves"? Gear up, strategize, and fight for victory in humanityâ€™s darkest hour!


SUPPORT
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ZombieWavesGame
Facebook fan group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/zombiewaves
Discord: https://discord.gg/zombiewaves
Customer Service: service.zombiewaves@gmail.com

title: Travel Town - Merge Adventure
summary:
Explore Travel Town, where you can combine everything into better and more useful items while you travel the world!

Reveal secrets as you discover yourself and help the friendly people of Travel Town!

TRAVEL TOWN FEATURES:

== Merge Objects ==
â€¢ Discover over 500 fantastic objects through hundreds of levels!
â€¢ Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and merge 2 of a kind evolve them into more superior items!
â€¢ Fulfill missions for the townsfolk to unlock more amazing items!

== Meet New Villagers ==
â€¢ Discover 55 villagers who live in Travel Town, and help them restore their seaside town!
â€¢ Match objects to upgrade them and unlock more and more items to support you on your journey!

== Rebuild the Town ==
â€¢ A storm has ravaged Travel Town - Collect coins and bring the town back to its former beauty!
â€¢ Discover and upgrade dozens of buildings and improve the town beyond your wildest dreams!

Follow Travel Town on Facebook and Instagram for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: facebook.com/TravelTownGame/
Instagram: instagram.com/traveltowngame/

Terms of Service: https://magmatic.games/terms-and-conditions-mg
Privacy Notice: https://magmatic.games/privacy-policy-mg/

Questions about the game? Contact us in the game by clicking on Settings > Contact Us
Our support is also ready and waiting at: https://support.traveltowngame.com/

title: GIRLS' FRONTLINE 2: EXILIUM
summary:
The end of an era, the dawn of another; the fall of a faction, the rise of another... The torchbearers shall shine upon the brave new world.

After severing ties with G&K, the Commander bid farewell to the past and chose to venture into the contamination zones. During their journey, the Commander encountered more and more individuals and Tactical Dolls. Each with their own unique stories, they became indispensable members of the Commander's team. The Commander, who only sought to complete bounty missions smoothly and earn a stable income, was unexpectedly ambushed during what appeared to be a routine transport mission. Far from the bustling vortex, it became clear that the Commander had been drawn into an even larger maelstrom...

GIRLS' FRONTLINE 2: EXILIUM is a Post-Apocalyptic Tactical RPG. In this game, you will fully experience:

[3D Immersive Combat, Multidimensional Strategy]
Stages are enriched with dynamic elements, including various cover options, mechanisms, and terrains. Analyze the combat situation and strategically lead your Dolls to victory.

[Realistic Weapon System, Free-Form Weapon Customization]
Handguns, machine guns, shotgunsâ€”every type of weapon is available with a 360Â° preview. Freely attach weapon accessories to create a unique appearance for your weapons. Equip your team with the finest weapons to face the toughest enemies.

[Immersive Animations, 360Â° Character Interaction]
Featuring high-quality character models with rich interactive features. In the Refitting Room, you can freely interact with the Dolls. In the Dormitory, you can use the dynamic camera to capture their day-to-day moments, and enjoy a unique, cozy experience.

[Covenant Ring: Forge Unbreakable Bonds with Your Dolls]
Inscribe your Covenant and unlock exclusive archives, memories, and voice lines for your Dolls. Affinity can be deepened through gift-giving. A Covenant with your Dolls can be formed at a certain Affinity level, which unlocks an exclusive Covenant Projection.

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@GFL2EXILlUMGLOBAL
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EXILIUMGLOBAL
Official Website: https://gf2.haoplay.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/gfl2-exilium

Supported Specifications:
RAM: 4 GB or more
Storage Space: 18 GB of available storage space or more
Operating System: Android 7.0 and above

title: MONOPOLY GO!
summary:
The wizarding world awaits! Hit GO! Roll the dice with the witches and wizards of Harry Potter! Earn MONOPOLY money, interact with your friends, family members and fellow Tycoons from around the world as you explore the expanding universe of MONOPOLY GO - now even more magical, welcoming iconic Hogwarts witches and wizards like Harry Potter, Albus Dumbledore, Hermione Granger, Severus Snape and many more! Itâ€™s the new way to play - board flipping cleanup not required!

Unlock magical maps! Discover Hogwarts Treasures!

Escape, enjoy, dream, scheme and stay in touch with this newly reimagined Harry Potter twist on MONOPOLY! Let everyone's favorite zillionaire, Mr. MONOPOLY, be your guide as you enjoy your favorite Harry Potter moments and Hogwarts maps like Hogsmeade, the Forbidden Forest or Diagon Alley.

So MONOPOLY GO!

Experience classic fun and visuals with gameplay fit for your phone! Collect Properties, build Houses and Hotels, pull Chance Cards, and of course, earn that MONOPOLY Money! Play with your favorite game Tokens such as the Racecar, Top Hat, Battleship, and more. Earn more tokens as you go - your favorite Harry Potter wizard or witch might be one!

See MONOPOLY icons like Mr. M, Scottie and Ms. MONOPOLY come to life, and brand new characters too!

Your Family Table!

Help or hinder! - You and friends can earn easy money with Community Chest and co-op events! Or heist their banks to help yourself get to the top.

The Hogwarts Express has arrived!

Collect and trade story-filled stickers with friends and family and in our MONOPOLY GO! Facebook Trading Groups! Complete the magical Harry Potter-themed album for huge rewards! Every collection features great wizards and witches, and takes you through iconic places across Hogwarts.

Features!

BUY & BUILD YOUR WAY TO THE TOP

Collect Property Tile Sets to build Houses and upgrade your Houses to Hotels to get even more rent from friends! All you have to do is hit GO! Can you catch the golden snitch?

ENJOY THAT CLASSIC MONOPOLY ATMOSPHERE

Roll the dice to enjoy the classic MONOPOLY board you know and love. Featuring familiar faces such as MR. MONOPOLY, and familiar spaces such as jail (womp womp!), Railroads, Properties, Tokens and more!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS AND FAMILY

Get social! Play with friends to take full advantage of new magical mini-games such as Community Chest â€“ where you and friends take a break from mischief and work together!

NEW OPPORTUNITIES EVERY DAY

Play Tournaments, the Prize Drop plinko mini-game, the Cash Grab mini-game and follow our Events for big rewards. With Harry Potter entering the world of MONOPOLY GO! mini-games are even more magical and fun! Roll into the wizarding world now and discover the magic of Harry Potter.

MONOPOLY GO! is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. Internet connection is required to play the game.

The MONOPOLY name and logo, the distinctive design of the game board, the four corner squares, the MR. MONOPOLY name and character, as well as each of the distinctive elements of board and playing pieces are trademarks of Hasbro, Inc. for its property trading game and game equipment. Â© 1935, 2023 Hasbro.

http://scopely.com/tos/

#additionalinfo-california

title: ROM: Remember Of Majesty
summary:
WORLD WIDE WAR

â–£ Game introduction â–£
Unfold the grand saga on the continent of Calderas!
Constant fights on the global battlefield with no boundaries.

â–  Rejoiceâ€”the days when grinding led to glory have returned!
Classic hardcore MMORPG / PC & Mobile Cross-platform

â–  Enter the frayâ€”without any national boundaries
The entire world is a massive battlefield!
Global One Build/ Simultaneous translation system

â–  Make it yoursâ€”the prize, glory, and power promised only to the victorious!
Endless campaigns ranging from Territory Wars and Siege Wars to the War of Monarchs

â–  Enjoyâ€”make the most of your money in the free marketplace with personal trading system
Item sealing system, and server/world auction houses

â–  Immerse yourselfâ€”begin the grand saga of the continent of Calderas
Experiencing a compelling story that unfolds across the vast lands of five continents

â–  Grow strongerâ€”take advantage of a familiar level-up system enhanced with added depth
Including costumes, guardians, item collections, engraving, and more

â–  Be patientâ€”the shop offers reasonable prices
"Exclusive costumes for your selected class !
Summoning guardians with soft currency !"


[Official Community]

Website: https://rom.kakaogames.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ROM.RememeberOfMajesty.EN

title: Clash of Clans
summary:
Join millions of players worldwide as you build your Village, join a Clan, and battle in epic multiplayer adventure war games!

Mustachioed Barbarians, fire wielding Wizards, and other unique Troops await your command. Enter the world of Clash!

Classic Features:
â— Start building your own Village in-game: Level up buildings like your Clan Castle and strengthen your defense game.
â— Multiplayer adventure games: Battle in Clan War games as a team against millions of active players across the globe.
â— Test your Village & castle defense skills: battle through Clan War Leagues and prove youâ€™re the best in the game.
â— Forge alliances, adventure, and battle together with your Clan in multiplayer Clan games.
â— Plan your unique battle strategy with countless combinations of Spells, Troops, and Heroes!
â— Compete with the best players from around the world and rise to the top of the Leaderboard in Legend League.
â— Collect resources, conquer and steal loot from other players on your adventure to keep building your own Village and turn it into an in-game stronghold.
â— Keep your Clan Castle safe and craft your defense against enemy attacks by building Towers, Cannons, Bombs, Traps, Mortars, and Walls to protect your Village in this multiplayer war game.
â— Command epic Heroes like the Barbarian King, Archer Queen, Grand Warden, Royal Champion, and Minion Prince.
â— Research upgrades in your Laboratory to make the Troops and Siege Machines you command even more powerful. Upgrade buildings and walls in your Village in-game to strengthen your castle defense.
â— Start building your own team and take part in multiplayer PVP real-time war games through Friendly Challenges, Friendly Wars, and special live multiplayer adventure game events.
â— Fight in a war against the Goblin King in a single player adventure campaign game mode through the realm.
â— Experiment with building your war and castle defense strategy in Practice Mode games.
â— Journey to the Builder Base and discover new characters in a mysterious world.
â— Turn your Builder Base into an unbeatable fortress. Start building up your castle and Village defense and conquer rival players in multiplayer Versus Battle war games.
â— Customize your Village with buildings, decor and sceneries unlocked in-game.

What are you waiting for, Chief? Get ready to conquer! Join the action today.

PLEASE NOTE! Clash of Clans is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. The game also includes random rewards.

A network connection is also required.

If you have fun playing Clash of Clans, you may also enjoy other multiplayer Supercell games like Clash Royale, Brawl Stars, Boom Beach, and Hay Day. Make sure to check those out!

Support: Chief, are you having problems? Visit https://help.supercellsupport.com/clash-of-clans/en/index.html or http://supr.cl/ClashForum or contact us in game by going to Settings > Help and Support.

Privacy Policy: http://www.supercell.net/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service: http://www.supercell.net/terms-of-service/

Parentâ€™s Guide: http://www.supercell.net/parents

title: MLB Rivals
summary:
Enjoy an Officially Licensed MLB Baseball Game Anytime, Anywhere

Experience the fully integrated 2025 MLB schedule, and take on the World Series with 2025 Live Cards!

The game now features baseball legends from the National Baseball Hall of Fameâ€”available as brand-new cards!

The game chosen by 2-time National League MVP Bryce Harper, MLB Rivals!

title: SLIME - ISEKAI Memories
summary:
Enter the world of That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime in a new 3D battle RPG!

A new story supervised by Fuse, author of the original light novels! A mysterious girl named Shinsha appears, claiming to be Rimuru's daughter.

Relive famous moments from Season 1 of the anime in fully voiced cut scenes!
The star-studded vocal cast lend their talents to battle voices and interactions in town as well!

Use the nation-building system to create your ideal version of Tempest!
Build and position all sorts of buildings and facilities: your citizens' homes, restaurants, the blacksmith shop, the laboratory, magic-enhancing facilities, and more.

3D command-based battle system!
The controls are simple: just select the cards for your hand. But there's deep strategic gameplay to enjoy as you learn to effectively use abilities drawn from the original work! Enjoy dazzling finishing move animations that will make you feel like you've stepped into the anime!

title: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang
summary:
Join your friends in Mobile Legends: Bang Bang, the brand new 5v5 MOBA showdown, and fight against real players! Choose your favorite heroes and build the perfect team with your comrades-in-arms! 10-second matchmaking, 10-minute battles. Laning, jungling, pushing, and teamfighting, all the fun of PC MOBA and action games in the palm of your hand! Feed your eSports spirit!

Mobile Legends: Bang Bang, the fascinating MOBA game on mobile. Smash and outplay your enemies and achieve the final victory with your teammates!

Your phone thirsts for battle!

Features:

1. Classic MOBA Maps & 5v5 Battles
Real-time 5v5 battles against real players. 3 lanes, 4 jungle areas, 2 bosses, 18 defense towers, and endless fights, everything a classic MOBA has is here!

2. Win with Teamwork & Strategy
Block damage, control the enemy, and heal teammates! Choose from Tanks, Mages, Marksmen, Assassins, Supports, etc. to anchor your team and be match MVP! New heroes are constantly being released!

3. Fair Fights, Carry Your Team to Victory
Just like classic MOBAs, there is no hero training or paying for stats. Skill and strategy are all you need to be able to win the intense competition on this fair and balanced platform. Play to Win, not Pay to Win.

4. Simple Controls, Easy to Master
With a virtual joystick on the left and skill buttons on the right, 2 fingers are all you need to become a master! Autolock and target switching allow you to last hit to your heartâ€™s content. Never miss! And a convenient tap-to-equip system allows you to buy equipment anywhere on the map so you can focus more on the thrill of battle!

5. 10 Second Matchmaking, 10 Minute Matches
Matchmaking only takes 10 seconds. And a match only takes 10 minutes. Gloss over the quiet early-game leveling up and jump right into the intense battles. Less boring waiting and repetitive farming, and more thrilling actions and fist-pumping victories. At any place, at any moment, just pick up your phone, fire up the game, and immerse yourself in the heart-pounding MOBA competition.

6. Smart Offline AI Assistance
A dropped connection could mean hanging your team out to dry in an intense match, but with Mobile Legends: Bang Bangâ€™s powerful reconnection system, if you get dropped, you can be back in the battle in seconds. And while youâ€™re offline, our AI system will take control of your character temporarily to avoid a 4-on-5 situation.

PLEASE NOTE! Mobile Legends: Bang Bang is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased with real money. If you want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Mobile Legends: Bang Bang.

Contact Us
You can get customer service assistance via the [Contact Us] button in the game to help you with any problems you may encounter while playing. You can also find us on the following platforms. We welcome all of your Mobile Legends: Bang Bang thoughts and suggestions:

Customer Service Email: mobilelegendsgame@moonton.com
Instagram: @mobilelegendsgame
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/MobileLegends5v5MOBA

title: RAVEN2
summary:
# Log In for a Heroic Holy Garment!
A special welcome gift for new Special Corps Members!
Log in to receive 1 Heroic Holy Garment Summon Scroll,
and take on the Growth Support Missions to quickly obtain Heroic Equipment!
Join the battlefield of RAVEN2 now!

# Ancient Fortress Guild War Update!
The massive GvG battleground Ancient Fortress is now open!
Conquer the fortress in large-scale guild battles and claim huge Crystal rewards!

# Gunslinger: Master of the Battlefield
The Gunslinger overwhelms foes with lightning-fast decisions and pinpoint precision!
Step onto the battlefield with the Gunslinger and claim your place as the new ruler of war.

â–£ Game Overview â–£

# Enter RAVEN2, the brutal dark fantasy MMORPG
Step into a boundless world where untamed adventure awaits!
Experience a world of breathtaking scale and beauty powered by Unreal Engine.
A brutal tale where darkness and beauty coexist...
Witness the ultimate real dark fantasy like never before.

# Forge your own epic tale
A gripping story brought to life through immersive cinematic storytelling.
An open-world adventure with a character of your choice...
The fate of the world lies at your fingertips.

# Choose from unique classes! Your fate in combat awaits!
Your decisions shape the flow of battle!
The "Assassin" who delivers lethal strikes from the shadows
The "Berserker" who annihilates enemies with overwhelming destructive power
The "Vanguard" who protects allies with a shield of steel
The "Elementalist" who dominates the battlefield with magic
The "Divine Caster" who supports allies with divine power
The "Night Ranger," who subdues enemies from afar
The "Destroyer," who throws enemy formations into chaos
The "Deathbringer," who turns the tide in battle with the power of Specters
The "Gunslinger", a hunter who overwhelms enemies with sharp judgment and precise skill
Become the champion of this battlefield who will bring light to the world.

# Perfect your hero with limitless customization
Intricate detail and total freedom.
A deep customization system that delivers powerful visual impact.
Create a hero that reflects your unique style and beauty, one unlike any other.

# Born in Blood. Built for War.
The battlefield calls. The war begins now.
Engage in massive battles filled with striking visual effects.
Fight relentlessly, overcome the inevitable, and rise as a legend.


Visit the official site for more information about the game.

Official Forum: https://forum.netmarble.com/raven2_gb
Official Website: https://raven2w.netmarble.com
Official Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@RAVEN2_gb
Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/raven2gb
Official Discord: https://discord.gg/raven2

title: MementoMori: AFKRPG
summary:
â€œAll roads lead to our â€˜Goodbye.â€™â€

Boasting an epic soundtrack that can turn the world of gaming on its head, and some of the most stunning designs ever seen in a game, Bank of Innovationâ€™s newest title, MementoMori, is finally here!

Songs performed by many renowned artists enhance the rich world of MementoMori.
*We recommend playing while wearing earphones or headphones.

â—† STORY:
A tale of â€œjusticeâ€ woven by girls whose fragile hearts verge on shattering...

There are girls who many call â€œwitches.â€
Although they themselves are ordinary, they can wield slightly extraordinary powers.
However, when calamity spreads throughout the land, witches begin to be feared and detested.
Before long, the Church of Longinus commenced what would be known as â€œThe Witch Hunt.â€

â€œWitches are to blame for this calamity. If we kill them, then the calamity will vanish along with them!â€

Witches are executed one by one.
But one day, as madness seizes control of the world, it is suddenly overrun by â€œCurses.â€
A country incinerated by hellfire. A kingdom consumed by crystals. An empire purged by the Tree of Life.
Such are the woeful desires of those who are called â€œWitches of Qlipha.â€
Without any means to defend themselves, nation after nation falls into ruin, until finallyâ€”
The fractured land is sent adrift high into the sky.

Meanwhile, the people have yet to take notice.
From within these girls cursed to be witches, there emanates glimmers of hope.
In order to save their decimated world, these girls set forth liberating the land from darkness.
For they believe that it is the right thing to do...

â—† GAME:
ãƒ»Play utilizing both easy-to-use full auto-battles and high-level strategy!
ãƒ»Behold stunning action-packed battles animated using Live2D!
ãƒ»Harness the â€œIdle Systemâ€ to gradually get stronger as the girls fight even while youâ€™re away!
ãƒ»Unlock tons of content as you advance the story!
ãƒ»Discover infinite strategic possibilities by combining your wit with the girlsâ€™ magical powers!
ãƒ»Enhance gear to precisely influence how the girls grow stronger!
ãƒ»Communicate with your friends as you form the most powerful guild in the land!

â—† SOUND:
The girls of MementoMori are burdened with cruel pasts and inevitable fates.
ãƒ»Cry to â€œLaments,â€ which sing each girlâ€™s emotions to life.
ãƒ»Play accompanied with a high-quality soundtrack not bound to the limits of game music.

The diversity of high-quality musical compositions heavily intertwines with the perilous world of MementoMori, providing a new and exciting gaming experience.

title: Doomsday Ã— Attack on Titan
summary:
The epic Attack on Titan collaboration has arrived! Team up with Eren and step through the rift in time to face a new set of trials in a post-apocalyptic world. Confront the threat of massive mutants head-on! Overcome ultimate challenges to unlock exclusive new Heroes and Shelter Skins, plus claim a ton of collaboration rewards. Commander, the truth about this world awaits you. Join the fight now and make this battlefield your own!

Doomsday: Last Survivors is a zombie survival game with multiplayer online competition and real-time strategy elements. Set in a near future where zombies have taken over the world, survivors must fight for their lives and humanity's future. As the Commander, you must lead fellow survivors to build their Shelter, explore fog-filled areas, and fight the zombies and rival factions! Are you tired of the usual strategy games and love zombie games? Check out Doomsday: Last Survivors to experience the exciting survival game!

[Game Highlights]

New Tower Defense Gameplay
Find new ways to beat your enemies in one of the coolest strategy games! Skilled survivors will join you to explore this fallen world oozing with the infected. Stay sharp, set up ideal Hero formations, and construct fortifications to survive the zombie invasion!

Survival of the Fittest
Lead troops and civilians in your Shelter! Exterminate zombies to survive the apocalypse, or raid other Shelters to sustain your own. You can also form an alliance and fight enemies with your allies in one of the best survival games!

A Realistic Doomsday Experience
The crisis continues to loom over us in a cruel world where it's kill or be killed. Want to experience one of the best immersive survival experiences in zombie games? Look no further! Check out the realistic spherical terrain system with convenient zoom controls that enable close-up Shelter views to satellite views. Download Doomsday: Last Survivors today!

Strategic Battles
Become the best at survival games by utilizing everything you can find. Train multiple troop types and execute diverse battle strategies with Hero skills and attacks to outlast the zombie hordes.

Unique Heroes
Realistic and exciting Hero designs portray survivors from different walks of life. Recruit talented Heroes to help lead your troops, defend your Shelter, and beat one of the best strategy games!

Commander, are you ready to survive the apocalypse?
Become the best at zombie games with your strength and wits!

===Information===
Official TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@doomsdaylastsurvivor
Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/DoomsdayLastSurvivors
Official Discord: https://discord.gg/doomsdaylastsurvivors
Customer Support: help.doomsday.android@igg.com
